email_chain.subject: Container Loading Request
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Jones, My name is Phil Gellman and I am the shipping manager at Nuvista Logistics. We would be interested in loading the following containers: 5 x 40HC dry loaded in GB for Gothenburg, 3 x 40HC dry loaded in GB for Gothenburg, 10 x 20GP dry loaded in GB for Gothenburg. Please let me know if there are any slot issues and how soon we could load. Many thanks, Phil

email_chain.subject: Re: Container Loading Request
email_chain.body: Hi Phil, Regarding your request for container cargo, it will not be possible for me to accept your offer at this time, because we have another supplier booked. We will contact you when we have a suitable offer for you. We appreciate your understanding. Regards, Ralph

email_chain.subject: Reminder: Shipment of 5 x 40HCs Loaded at Gothenburg
email_chain.body: Dear Ralph, This is a reminder regarding the shipment of 5 x 40HCs loaded at Gothenburg for your company. We are ready to move these containers as soon as you have confirmed the booking. Best regards, Paul

email_chain.subject: Cancellation of Shipment
email_chain.body: Ralph, The container shipment of 5 x 40HCs loaded at Gothenburg has been canceled. Please let me know if we can help you with another booking. Regards, Paul

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Cancellation
email_chain.body: Hi Paul, Can you confirm that the shipment of 5 x 40HCs loaded at Gothenburg has been canceled? Many thanks, Phil

email_chain.subject: Awaiting Confirmation of Cancellation
email_chain.body: Paul, We are still awaiting confirmation that the booking of 5 x 40HCs, loaded in Gothenburg, has been canceled. Let us know as soon as possible if this is the case. Regards, Micael

email_chain.subject: Re: Awaiting Confirmation of Cancellation
email_chain.body: Hi Micael, I am glad to confirm that the booking of the 5 x 40HCs, loaded in Gothenburg, has been canceled. We appreciate your support. Many thanks, Paul

email_chain.subject: Final Confirmation of Cancellation
email_chain.body: Paul, Can you confirm that the booking of 5 x 40HCs loaded in Gothenburg has been canceled? We appreciate your confirmation. Best regards, Micael

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Confirmation of Cancellation
email_chain.body: Hi Micael, I am glad to confirm that the booking of the 5 x 40HCs, loaded in Gothenburg, has been canceled. We appreciate your support. Many thanks, Paul

labels.cargo_size: 5 x 40HC dry, 3 x 40HC dry, 10 x 20GP dry

email_chain.subject: Request for Steel Mill Charter
email_chain.body:
Dear Zane,

We’re loading 7,000MT of vegetables from Dar es Salaam to Addis Ababa on Monday. Would it be possible to book 500MT of steel mill from Hamburg to Yokohama to release the vessel? How’s your destination demurrage?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Steel Mill Charter
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thanks for your message. I’ll check on the destination demurrage. The Hamburg-Malaga-East Africa trade is highly competitive right now, with service owners wanting to keep their vessels busy. My principal still does not have any available steel mill.

Best regards,
Zane

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Steel Mill Charter
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I just received word from Hamburg. We will still be able to charter a steel mill on the Hamburg-Malaga-East Africa trade for this Monday. I see one departure from Hamburg and one from Malaga with a possible unloading location in Mombasa. We will reserve one vessel for this delivery.

Best regards,
Zane

email_chain.subject: Request on the Way to the Meeting
email_chain.body:
Dear Zane,

Sorry, my colleague requested this on the way to the meeting. Thanks for your help.

Cheers,
Mika

email_chain.subject: Quote for Port and Craneage
email_chain.body:
Dear Zane,

I would like to have a quote for port and craneage for 100m3 of petrochemicals in Antwerp.

Best,
Justin

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote for Port and Craneage
email_chain.body:
Dear Justin,

Our standard freight rate of EUR 145 is for a standard 10m3 container from Noyers to Antwerp. For this shipment, with a volume of 100 m3, the applicable freight rate would be EUR 17,500.

Please inform me if you require any further information.

Best regards,
Zane

email_chain.subject: Charter Inquiry for Shale Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

Any chance you can do a charter of 4,200MT of shale to Venice from Rotterdam next Thursday?

Regards,
Leslie

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry for Shale Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

Did I hear you say that you can now spare the M/V Lucie?
The Venice shipment is 4,200MT, and would we have the Jane available on the Tuesday or Thursday of next week for an estimated load of oil?

Thanks,
Leslie

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry for Shale Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

The Lucie is a diesel ship with an operational capacity of around 5,000MT. I'm having trouble believing that 4,200MT of diesel could be raised for your ship. Given that the M/V Phyllis only loads 4,000MT of diesel and that the Phoenix is an even bigger ship, it just doesn't sound like we'll get the quantity that you require.

Many thanks,
Leslie

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry for Shale Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

I think that our inability to provide the quantity you're

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry for Shale Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

Please don't misunderstand, I understand the supply chain. I'm trying to help my customer find a shipping vessel. What I'm not saying is that you can't get the 4,200MT of diesel that the buyer requires, I'm just saying

email_chain.subject: Design of 50,000MT Shipment from Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Boris,

We’re working on the design of a 50,000MT shipment of corrugated sheets from Qingdao to New York. Do you accept the order as is or can we adjust delivery dates?

Yours,
Mikaela

email_chain.subject: Re: Design of 50,000MT Shipment from Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Boris,

Thanks for your kind offer. We can only pay by EFT. How soon can you transfer the money?

Regards,
Mikaela

email_chain.subject: Re: Design of 50,000MT Shipment from Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Mikaela,

I'm sorry, we don't accept EFT payments. However, I would like to remind you that we've already deducted our handling fee.

Yours,
Boris

email_chain.subject: Re: Design of 50,000MT Shipment from Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Boris,

Your email surprises me. We already discussed EFT payments. Please provide our bank details for an EFT transfer and confirm the transaction to proceed.

Regards,
Mikaela

email_chain.subject: Re: Design of 50,000MT Shipment from Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Mikaela,

I'm sorry, but I'm afraid our bank will charge you a penalty for a premature payment.

Yours,
Boris

email_chain.subject: Re: Design of 50,000MT Shipment from Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Boris,

This is unusual, and I’m sorry for my impatience. Can you tell me how soon I can expect your response?

Regards,
Mikaela

email_chain.subject: Re: Design of 50,000MT Shipment from Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Mikaela,

I am sorry for the confusion. We have just been busy with several other clients. I'll send you our bank details for an EFT transfer by Monday. I hope you can help us with this order.

Regards,
Boris

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry for Methanol from India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi Rahul,

Can I have an open slot to ship 8,400MT of methanol from India to Chile? We can come on at noon Sunday, with a laycan by Friday. If that sounds good, could you confirm my details and send a proforma invoice?

Thanks,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Methanol from India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Thanks for the enquiry. We can carry your cargo with a 7-day laycan from India to Chile. We will send a proforma invoice for 1 MT as a sample. If this sounds ok, please reply with your bank details and I will send the proforma.

Thanks,
Rahul

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Methanol from India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi Rahul,

Our bank is IndusInd Bank Mumbai. Please send the proforma with the relevant info.

Thanks,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Methanol from India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Sorry, IndusInd does not transfer dollars to India. Your FOB price of $350 is for rupees at INR 72, not dollars. Our 8,400 MT requirement would be $3.2 million at current rates. We can ship 300 MT every two weeks for five months. I’ll convert these prices to rupees and send a proforma invoice.

Best,
Rahul

email_chain.subject: Proforma Invoice and Shipping Details
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Please see the attached proforma invoice for 300 MT of methanol at INR 71,249 per MT. We will ship your first load of methanol on 14 November 2018. Your next three loads will be due 28 November, 12 December, and 26 December 2018. Your total requirement will be 8,400 MT, which is worth $3.2 million at our current rates. I have enclosed a copy of your credit application form, which I will process to send you a formal letter of credit (LC). Please sign and return this form, and I will attach it to your LC for immediate processing.

Best,
Rahul

email_chain.subject: Re: Proforma Invoice and Shipping Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Rahul,

Thanks for your detailed reply. We need to finalize the contract before the weekend, so we need to be sure

Thanks,
David

email_chain.subject: Flight Availability from Paris to Naples
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Wang,

Could you let me know if you have a D3/DD2 from Paris to Naples next week, please?

Thanks,
Bill

email_chain.subject: Re: Flight Availability from Paris to Naples
email_chain.body:
Sir,

I had confirmed my reservation for our flight on June 8 to Rome from Paris, but I was not able to find any D3/D2 flights to Naples from Rome for that day.

Could you check for me if there are any flight availability?

Thanks,
Marc

email_chain.subject: Re: Flight Availability from Paris to Naples
email_chain.body:
Hi Marc,

I checked with my colleague, and no D3/D2 flight is available from Rome to Naples on June 8. However, the alternate flight from Florence to Naples is available.

Could you let me know if you are flexible with your original destination?

Thanks,
Patricia

email_chain.subject: Re: Flight Availability from Paris to Naples
email_chain.body:
Sir,

I am not flexible with the destination. Could you check to see if there are any other D3/D2 flights from Rome or Florence to Naples?

Thanks,
Marc

email_chain.subject: Re: Flight Availability from Paris to Naples
email_chain.body:
Hi Marc,

Sorry for the inconvenience. I checked with my colleague...

email_chain.subject: Shipment from Singapore to Phuket
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Davidson,

You mentioned you’d consider a voyage from Singapore to Phuket on our services. Could you respond on the following basis? We’ve pulled your recent shipment activity and note you’ve carried a similar quantity in the last month from Vigo to La Rochelle. Would that fit your requirements for the first week in October?

Thanks,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment from Singapore to Phuket
email_chain.body:
Hello James,

Sorry, we did not get your email. I need more info. Can you tell me:

- How many containers are you planning to ship?
- What's the total weight?
- Does it go from Vigo to La Rochelle, or does it need to start at Vigo and end at La Rochelle?

Please respond ASAP.
Thanks,
Janet

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment from Vigo to La Rochelle
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Davidson,

You stated you need to know if we will be able to handle a 20-foot container for you from Vigo to La Rochelle. Of course, we are able to handle this delivery with total satisfaction to you and your customer in Phuket.

Just give me a call at 555-555-1212 with the weight of your cargo and we can work out the details.

Regards,
Fred

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment from Vigo to Phuket
email_chain.body:
Hello Fred,

You may remember that I asked you about a 20-foot container from Vigo to La Rochelle, but that is not what we need. We need a full load 20-foot container from Vigo to Phuket. We need to know if you are interested in this, or not, in the next 24 hours. I want to know if I can depend on you to be available and responsive.

Thanks,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment from Vigo to Phuket
email_chain.body:
Hi Fred,

Do you remember our phone conversation last week? I called you about the shipment you were helping us set up between Vigo and La Rochelle. Now I need to know about a 20-foot container from Vigo to Phuket.

I do not have much time. Can you tell me if this service is available, or not, in the next 24 hours?

Please call me at 555-555-1212.

Thanks,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment from Vigo to La Rochelle
email_chain.body:
Hi Fred,

I’m looking at all my emails to you from the last 2 months. I need to know if you can handle a 20-foot container from Vigo to La Rochelle. Please tell me yes or no. I have to choose between you and your competitor. I can send the shipment on Monday or Tuesday.

Regards,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Technical Issue with Ivory Order
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Kaulen,

I hope this message finds you well.

I regret to inform you that we will have to postpone your order of 1,740MT of ivory due to a technical issue. I am confident you will understand.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,
Rita

email_chain.subject: Proposed Terms for Ivory Stock
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Kaulen,

I hope you are doing well.

This is Rita from Synergy Trading, Ltd. We are interested in your ivory stock. Please find attached the proposed terms for your ivory stock.

If you agree with these terms, please give me a call at (212) 555-9876.

I am looking forward to working with you.

Best regards,
Rita

email_chain.subject: Contract for Ivory Order
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Kaulen,

It was a pleasure meeting you this morning.

I will be sending you a contract for 1,740MT of ivory shortly. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.

Best regards,
Rita

email_chain.subject: Technical Issue with Ivory Order
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Kaulen,

I hope this message finds you well.

I regret to inform you that we will have to postpone your order of 1,740MT of ivory due to a technical issue. I am confident you will understand.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,
Rita

email_chain.subject: Proposed Terms for Ivory Stock
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Kaulen,

I hope you are doing well.

This is Rita from Synergy Trading, Ltd. We are interested in your ivory stock. Please find attached the proposed terms for your ivory stock.

If you agree with these terms, please give me a call at (212) 555-9876.

I am looking forward to working with you.

Best regards,
Rita

email_chain.subject: Contract for Ivory Order
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Kaulen,

It was a pleasure meeting you this morning.

I will be sending you a contract for 1,740MT of ivory shortly. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.

Best regards,
Rita

email_chain.subject: Request for Purchase Order - Isopropanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Bernhardt,

Would you be able to forward me the purchase order for 3,000MT of isopropanol from Houston to Brisbane?

Thanks,
Trevor

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Purchase Order - Isopropanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Thanks for the orders. I’ll get them processed.

As a favor, can you place an order for 2,000MT of glycol and 4,000MT of isopropanol from Brisbane to Singapore? It’s been a pretty slow month for us, and I don’t really want to take more space out of the trucks.

Thanks,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Order Confirmation - Glycol and Isopropanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Thanks Trevor.

I’ve emailed the orders through to Procurement and will send you copies when they’ve been approved. Please let me know if you have any urgent changes to orders.

Thanks,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Purchase Order Attached
email_chain.body:
Thanks for your email Trevor.

You will find the purchase order attached. Please prepare the final documents as per the order.

Thanks,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipment Quote
email_chain.body: Good morning Ms. Browne, I need to move 5,000MT of plums from Maracay to Tijuana on an FIO basis. I've heard great things about your service and would appreciate your help with this shipment. I need your proposed rate by the end of the day. Thanks in advance! Regards, Marty

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipment Quote
email_chain.body: Good morning Mr. Vega, You're one of our most valued customers, and we’re committed to providing you with the best possible rate. I just spoke to Maria from fio.com, and she assured me that we can offer you a rate lower than what your competitors are offering. If you have any concerns, please feel free to give me a call. I’ll be available to meet with you today. Regards, Matt

email_chain.subject: Request for Support in Transporting Coal Cargo
email_chain.body:
Good day Sir,

Here are the details of the coal cargo we are looking to transport in the coming months. May we count on your support?

Regards,
Captain Ogas

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Support in Transporting Coal Cargo
email_chain.body:
Dear Captain Ogas,

It has come to our attention that the vessels approaching the port to offload the cargo of your client have been subject to some delays due to the ongoing COVID restrictions. We hope to welcome the cargo on their respective ships as soon as possible.

Kind regards,
Captain Sos

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Coal Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good day Sir,

We are yet to hear back from you regarding the coal cargo shipment of your client. May we count on your support in the near future?

With best regards,
Captain Wong

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Vanadium Pentoxide Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Xander,

I heard you are shipping a shipment of vanadium pentoxide in January. Do you have any idea on the price per MT?

Thanks for your time.

Kind regards,
Ziembla

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Vanadium Pentoxide Shipment
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your inquiry. I am busy arranging a shipment of vanadium pentoxide in the first week of January. It is for a private customer from Australia. I will have a quote for you soon.

Hope this helps.

Best regards,
Zoë

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Vanadium Pentoxide Shipment
email_chain.body:
Thank you very much for your quotes. It is much appreciated. Please send your preferred method of payment and let me know if there are any special requirements. This way I can confirm the contract.

Kind regards,
Ziembla

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Receipt
email_chain.body:
Hello, Ms. Xander,

I am Alex Jones from Peet Shippers. I would like to inform you that we received your products safely at Peet Shippers. Please find the bill of lading below.

We will pay the bill this week.

Thank you for trusting Peet Shippers.

Regards,
Alex Jones

email_chain.subject: Update on LNG Terminal and Chile Assessment
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Reynolds,
How's the next LNG terminal coming along?
Please confirm when you'll have your assessment of the option for Chile.
Thanks,
Gabriel

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on LNG Terminal and Chile Assessment
email_chain.body:
Hi Gabriel,
Good to hear from you. We had an internal meeting yesterday about projects. The press wants to know more about the supply and demand aspect of the E&P situation and whether the PEMEX operation in Trinidad and Tobago will be renewed. Do you have anything you can put together for them in an upcoming article?
We also discussed moving forward with the new supply/demand report. We want to look at the 2012 report first. This may involve getting some more data. However, after we review this, we will most likely look into continuing with the Latin America report.
Please let me know if you have any other suggestions or questions.
Looking forward to the next conversation.
Best regards,
Eric

email_chain.subject: Update on E&P Report
email_chain.body:
Hi Eric,
How's the E&P report coming along? We have some additional data on the E&P facilities.
Great. Let me know when you have the report in place and I will send you a copy for our internal review.
Looking forward to the next conversation.
Best regards,
Gabriel

email_chain.subject: Quote Request for Styrene Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Brunner,

Could you quote 1,900MT of styrene from Kaohsiung to Daesan? Could you perform all necessary customs clearing and breakbulk operations, and is there a possibility of sea weather issues affecting the schedule?

Looking forward to a friendly trade,
Stuart

email_chain.subject: Good Friday Shipping Options
email_chain.body:
Hi Tony,

On behalf of a family friend in South Korea, we would like to ship several pallets of goods from Daesan to Chicago in June. We would like to ship about 2,000kg of polyester filament yarn, 1,900kg of polyester filament yarn, and 700kg of acetate fiber in a shipping container that would arrive sometime within the first week of June. We are looking for a rate, itinerary, and shipping options for a June 8th shipping deadline.

Could you please quote us a rate and itinerary for the options below? If we have any questions about any of the options, please let us know.

A. Barge shipping to Vancouver in a container with rail to Chicago (Estimated cost for 3,000kg)
1. $30,000 USD

Regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Request for Truck Financing
email_chain.body:
Hello James,

We are in need of buying a truck to transport material in order to construct a new road, but we don't have enough money to pay in cash. Can you help us to borrow the money? Please see attached documents for reference. Looking forward to hear from you. I am on duty until Friday.

Best regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Sale of 2004 Ford F-350 Pickup Truck
email_chain.body:
Hi Tony,

We have a 2004 Ford F-350 pickup truck that is in very good condition with under 100,000 miles on the clock. We would like to sell it at the lowest possible price.

1. Asking Price: $13,000 (USD)
2. Price to us: $10,000 (USD)
3. Model: Ford F-350
4. Transmission: Automatic

Regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Quote Request for Roll Containers
email_chain.body:
Hi Tony,

Attached is a letter from a customer requesting a quote. He would like to know about the availability of roll containers and also the transportation options. Please get back to me as soon as possible.

Regards,
Customer

email_chain.subject: Transportation of 11 Cars from US to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Hi Tony,

As you know, we are looking for a truck to transport 11 cars from the US to Los Angeles and we would appreciate your assistance.

Best regards,
Customer

email_chain.subject: Quote Request for Water Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Tony,

I am looking for a price for shipping 14,000,000 liters of water from Baltimore to New York. We would like to have water on a barge. Could you please let me know the cost of shipping 14 million liters of water to New York?

Regards,
Louise

labels.commodity: Styrene, Polyester Filament Yarn, Acetate Fiber, Water

email_chain.subject: Urgent Shipment Request for Raisins
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Lee,

We need a combined NVOCC shipment of 8,000MT of raisins from Tangier to Guangzhou. Do you have space this weekend, and can we finalize the rate within two days?

Best,
Dylan

email_chain.subject: Urgent Shipment Request for Raisins
email_chain.body:
Mr. Lee,

We are in a bind at the moment and need 10,000MT of raisins delivered to Guangzhou next weekend. If you have any space available we can do a combined NVOCC shipment. Can you get back to me within two days?

Best,
Ben

email_chain.subject: Raisin Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Is it possible to get 10,000MT of raisins on this ship? We have a combined NVOCC shipment available.

- George

email_chain.subject: Re: Raisin Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi George,

Yes, we have space available. Is your shipment on FCL or LCL?

- Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Raisin Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Mark,

Our shipment is on LCL.

- Charles

email_chain.subject: Re: Raisin Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
OK, LCL is fine. The combined rate for the FCL and LCL is $0.90/Metric Tonne. You are welcome to send a more detailed email with your pickup/dropoff location, etc.

- Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Raisin Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Mark,

Thank you for your quote. We will get back to you with a purchase order.

- William

email_chain.subject: Change in Shipment Route
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thanks for your quote for a 600MT shipment of corn from Philadelphia to Hamburg. I’d like to change the route and have you quote a vessel from Philly to Kiel instead.

Kind regards,
Allyn

email_chain.subject: Re: Change in Shipment Route
email_chain.body:
Hi Allyn,

Here is my quote for that shipment from Philadelphia to Kiel. Vessel details are listed below, alongside some potential departure dates.

I look forward to working with you.

Regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Quote Request for Oil Field Machinery Shipment
email_chain.body:
Howdy John,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to check the availability for 5,200MT of oil field machinery from Houston to East London. Could you please provide us with a quote for an upcoming cargo that needs to leave in the next couple of weeks? Additionally, could you let us know the cost for 40 days’ demurrage?

Thanks so much,
Bert

email_chain.subject: Farm Machinery Shipment Update
email_chain.body:
Hey John,

The trailer load of farm machinery that left on the weekly 3:20 pm flight from Houston to the Cape has arrived in East London and has been unloaded. We believe that all the items were received safely by the client.

Have a great day,
Nicola

email_chain.subject: Request to Use Image
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Maddy,
The sample email included the information of Ms. Karina with an image of her. I would like to use this image in my email to you. Would that be possible?
Kind regards,
Sana

email_chain.subject: Re: Request to Use Image
email_chain.body:
Hey Sana,
I am sorry if I do not understand correctly your request. Can you help me understand?
I would be happy to share the image with you.
Kind regards,
Maddy

email_chain.subject: Re: Request to Use Image
email_chain.body:
Hey Ms. Maddy,
Can you help me understand what you want? I am not sure how you use the images in email, but I think you could easily place the image in your email.
Kind regards,
Sana

email_chain.subject: Re: Request to Use Image
email_chain.body:
Hey Sana,
How can I help? I hope you are doing well!
This is an image of Ms. Karina.
Kind regards,
Maddy

email_chain.subject: Re: Request to Use Image
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Maddy,
I think you might want to revise your approach. I would like to use this image in my email.
Kind regards,
Sana

email_chain.subject: Re: Request to Use Image
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Maddy,
Thank you for your reply! I am looking forward to hearing back from you.
Kind regards,
Sana

email_chain.subject: Re: Request to Use Image
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Maddy,
Can you please tell me when you want me to send the information I have sent.
Kind regards,
Sana

email_chain.subject: Re: Request to Use Image
email_chain.body:
Hi Sana,
Thank you for your reply! I am glad to know that I am doing well. I will let you know when I get the image.
Kind regards,
Maddy

email_chain.subject: New Warehouse in Shenzhen
email_chain.body:
Hi Dr. Tang,

I am pleased to announce that our new warehouse will be located in Shenzhen, in the customs area. The customs area is a designated zone for goods under customs control, allowing for streamlined import and export processes.

It has 3 floors, with a total floor area of 1,600m2. We will continue to supply the high-quality, cost-effective products, and competitive logistics services.

I hope you are well, please visit us soon!

Yours sincerely,
Arthur

email_chain.subject: Re: New Warehouse in Shenzhen
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Tang,

Sincerely,
My company

email_chain.subject: Fuel Pump Upgrade Notification
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

We are writing to inform you that we will be upgrading the fuel pump for your car to a more reliable model. This will be performed at 45,000 miles. Unfortunately, this is an inconvenience, as we have already offered to extend the warranty on the car to cover the RLC pump, and now we have to do an unscheduled service.

The service will be performed on Saturday, January 1st, and you can bring your car in anytime during the day. We apologize for the inconvenience, but we hope that we are making the right decision for you.

If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.

Sincerely,
Logan

email_chain.subject: LPG Shipment Delay Notification
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ju Li,

We are sorry to inform you that your LPG shipment did not arrive at the dealership. However, we are still working on resolving this issue and will notify you of a new delivery date as soon as possible.

Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions.

Sincerely,
Logan

email_chain.subject: Re: Fuel Pump Upgrade and LPG Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Logan,

Thank you for your email. I was just wondering how my car is getting upgraded to a more reliable fuel pump, as per the email you sent on Friday. I have not yet heard from you regarding the LPG shipment. Would you be able to respond to these two issues as soon as possible, please?

My apologies for taking so long to respond to your email.

Thank you,
Ben

email_chain.subject: Shipping Quote Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Petch,

I need to book 3 vessels next month - one for 3,000MT from St. Petersburg to Portovik, one for 2,200MT from Shanghai to San Juan, and one for 5,000MT from Busan to Rostock. Are your rates competitive?

I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Quote Request
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

There will be $60/mt shipping from St. Petersburg to Portovik in a container ship. There are 50% chances to secure a ship from Shanghai to San Juan in a bulk carrier. This cost is estimated to be $40/mt. Let's make it $45/mt. The cost of $4/mt from Busan to Rostock in a bulk carrier is estimated. We are quoting you a total of $165,000 for all the above. This rate is the lowest that we can offer.

Kind regards,
Ilya

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Quote Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Ilya,

In your reply, you stated the following quote:

The cost of $4/mt from Busan to Rostock in a bulk carrier is estimated. We are quoting you a total of $165,000 for all the above. This rate is the lowest that we can offer.

This rate seems reasonable to me. I will be looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Transhipping Sugar Cane from Jiangyin to Washington
email_chain.body:
Hello Sir,
Do you see any lead time available in transhipping 7,000MT of sugar cane (REF50) from Jiangyin to Rotterdam and shipping it from Rotterdam to Washington?
Could you advise if you could arrange this under CIF and clarify your earliest laycan slot?
Regards,
Mr. Ashok

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Transhipping Sugar Cane from Jiangyin to Washington
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ashok,
Thank you for your enquiry regarding the export of 7,000MT sugar cane from Jiangyin, Jiangsu Province, China to Washington, DC port, USA.
For your reference, please find below our non-binding best available freight quote for the cargo in FCL mode from China, Russia or Taiwan to USA.
Please note that the quoted rate does not include: clearance charges, tuck-in/out charge, loading/unloading charges, VGM declaration, terminal and pilotage, lockage, vessel port call surcharge, detention/demurrage.
In addition to the freight rate, you will also have to pay terminal handling charges which are based on the type of service selected and handling facilities required.
Quoted rates for shipper’s and consignee’s transport insurance (depending on loading and unloading of goods in transit).
Best regards,
Broker

Mr. Yang

email_chain.subject: Shipment of US Maize from Aberdeen to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, We've shipped out our 3,200MT of US maize from Aberdeen to Rotterdam on your IEN28R. Please advise your earliest delivery slots for the relevant breakbulk vessel so we can compare costs. Yours truly, Gail

email_chain.subject: Expected ETAs for US Maize Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, I have spoken to our logistics colleagues and to our internal fleet. Based on your sailings, the expected ETAs are: Singapore – 26 February / 04 March, Rotterdam – 25 March / April. I hope that is acceptable to you. Regards, Gail

email_chain.subject: Discharge and Loading Schedule for US Maize
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, We're getting ready to discharge your 3,200MT of US maize from the M/V IEN28R in Rotterdam on 26 Feb./04 Mar. We hope to load it onto the M/V SAC20S on 25 March/April. Please advise of your earliest arrival slots, and we'll get back to you. Yours truly, Gail

email_chain.subject: US Maize Ready for Transfer in Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, The US maize on board M/V IEN28R is now on the quay in Rotterdam and ready to be transferred to your ship. As discussed on the phone, the port slot is available from 25 March to 06 April. I've passed your request onto our internal team. We'll get back to you with our preferred ship. Yours truly, Gail

email_chain.subject: Preferred Ship Option for US Maize
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, The port slot has been passed to our internal team, and they have identified the M/V SAC25J as the preferred option. The ship will arrive on 26 Mar. with its first and last port slots set as 26 Mar. and 02 Apr. Please confirm your slot to them. Regards, Gail

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote on Soymeal Shipment
email_chain.body: You’re very fortunate to be receiving our attention, which has just been bestowed to your reply to Email B. We’d like a quote for 3,200MT of soymeal from New Orleans to Shepparton. What is your lumpsum for this order? Best wishes, Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote on Soymeal Shipment
email_chain.body: I’ve had a closer look at your request and couldn’t find anything in your history to do with soymeal that would enable us to come up with a competitive quote. Your history shows a steady 6 months’ worth of deliveries – but in the meantime you’ve done no business with us. Your volumes are in the hundreds of thousands of tonnes per month. For reference, we can only provide quotes on orders of 50,000 tonnes. So what would it take to make this happen? Let me know if you’ve got any ideas. Regards, Kirsty

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote on Soymeal Shipment
email_chain.body: Having reflected on it, we can offer you a reduced rate if we guarantee delivery of at least 1,000 tonnes per month, for an extended period. Given that we have a similar monthly requirement of soymeal, this doesn’t cause us any significant disruption to our operation. However, this is dependent on us securing the volumes we need – for which we require a commitment from you. We need to know if we can rely on you to deliver the specified quantity – and if so, when. We’ll send our latest supply schedule to you. Please let us know by return if you’re interested in this deal. Best wishes, Joe

email_chain.subject: Shipment Inquiry for Fresh Garlic
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Xavier,

We have a small shipment of 160MT of fresh garlic from Cairo to Jeddah that will sail on the Sea Navigator on the 26th. The cargo will be shipped in a sea container and will be ready for loading at the discharge port by 26 August. Are you interested in handling this shipment?

Best,
Henry

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Inquiry for Fresh Garlic
email_chain.body:
Henry,

Thanks for the inquiry. We are unable to accept the order as we will be on vacation for a few days. We will be back to work on the 1st September.

Regards,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Reconfirm Fresh Garlic Order
email_chain.body:
Henry,

We have been back at work and wanted to reconfirm the fresh garlic order. Is this still valid? We are interested in arranging this shipment. What is the full weight of the cargo? What is the packing volume of the cargo? When are you planning to load the container?

Thanks,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Re: Reconfirm Fresh Garlic Order
email_chain.body:
Hi Tony,

It is still valid. The full weight of the cargo will be 160MT. The packing volume will be 36CBM. The container will be loaded on 2nd September. How are you going to handle this shipment?

Best,
Henry

email_chain.subject: Re: Reconfirm Fresh Garlic Order
email_chain.body:
Hi Henry,

I am looking forward to handling this shipment. I am interested in sea transport. I am looking at the Seaway Transit liner; do you think it will be able to provide us with a suitable transit time for this shipment? Are you still waiting for the packing volume and weights?

Regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Re: Reconfirm Fresh Garlic Order
email_chain.body:
Hi Tony,

I have been trying to obtain the packing volume and weight of the fresh garlic. I am not able to obtain this from the supplier.

Regards,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Jet Fuel
email_chain.body:
Dear Jim,

Sorry for not getting back to you. I’ve just found this. Let me confirm the following to you:
1. You should have onboard time of 10 hours to Suez Canal.
2. Your vessel ETA to New Orleans is on 17 June 2022.
3. Ship’s name: L5 Master & QM: Captain Henrique Damasceno & Mercu Regalado.

Can you please check with the charterer on your specific time from the dock to the EDCT?

Looking forward to hearing from you.
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Jet Fuel
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

The charterer has told me that they need the EDCT at 11:59pm on 13 June 2022. Do you still have time for the schedule you have offered me on 12 June?

Many thanks,
Jim

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Jet Fuel
email_chain.body:
Dear Jim,

It depends on the exact time. We can start to load oil at 5am until 5:30am. But unfortunately, we will not be able to load after 6:30am until the next day. For example, we can load the oil until 9am on Monday (13 June 2022), but we cannot start loading oil after 9:30am and we cannot finish loading oil before 6pm, so we will finish at 5:30am on 14 June 2022. We will have to stop loading after 6:30am as the boss of the EDCT do not want any more loading after 6:30am. I will check the ETA again.

Thank you,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Confirmation for Kerosene Job
email_chain.body: Thanks for confirming your slot on the kerosene job. I just need to confirm your draft restrictions - are you cleared to touch at Las Palmas? I’ll see you on September 12. Best, Eva

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation for Kerosene Job
email_chain.body: Thanks for getting back to me. We were wondering if we could push up the entry by a day to Saturday, 10th September. As you may have noticed, the winds are picking up and are expected to get worse as we get closer to Icy and Snowy. We are concerned that this might slow us down if it means having to tack with the winds going onshore or worse, get caught in a rounding with waves much larger than what we have seen. The job is absolutely essential so I wanted to check with you about this. Thanks so much. Julie

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation for Kerosene Job
email_chain.body: Thanks for getting back to me. Unfortunately, I’ll be in Hong Kong from 7th to 11th September, so the job will have to be postponed to the 13th. I’m sorry this is going to cause you an inconvenience. Please change my flights. I’ll be able to fly back on the 13th, but my bags will need to be forwarded from Hong Kong to Paris. They’ll need to be sent to Marseille then to Valencia, so please forward them by 12th September. Best, Eva

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation for Kerosene Job
email_chain.body: Thanks for letting me know when we will meet! We're going to take off on the 15th of September and land on the 19th. We'll be at the Grand Hôtel du Grand Port Maritime on the 16th. You will know exactly where to find us when you arrive in Valencia! Julie

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation for Kerosene Job
email_chain.body: Yes! We're going to get in touch with the crew today! This is the right solution for us. Thank you! Julie

email_chain.subject: Grain Shipment from Jeddah to Puntarenas

email_chain.subject: Re: Grain Shipment from Jeddah to Puntarenas

Thanks,

email_chain.subject: Re: Grain Shipment from Jeddah to Puntarenas

email_chain.subject: Re: Grain Shipment from Jeddah to Puntarenas

email_chain.subject: Emergency Booking to Rotterdam

Good morning Gerardo,

We have an emergency booking to dispatch. We need to deliver your cargo in Rotterdam (RAF). The ETA will be 26/07/2022. We can accept the booking up until 30/07/2022. I need to know what kind of terms of delivery you need and the best arrival date.

email_chain.subject: Re: Emergency Booking to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:

As we have the cargo in Rotterdam (RAF), we can dispatch from there.

email_chain.subject: Shipping Request for Methanol from Busan to Daesan
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

We're looking to send 15,000MT of methanol from Busan to Daesan. How soon can you load and deliver? Also, please confirm if you offer any flexibility on demurrage.

Thanks,
Natalie

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Request for Methanol from Busan to Daesan
email_chain.body:
Hi Natalie,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can load and deliver the methanol in 10 days from Busan, and our FOB costs for 15,000MT would be $US100/ton. Unfortunately, we have no flexibility on demurrage charges.

Additionally, I wanted to let you know that I have referred you to Alex because of a potential project he is working on. Is he available?

Thanks for your time,
Angel

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Request for Methanol from Busan to Daesan
email_chain.body:
Hi Natalie,

Thanks for introducing me to Angel. His e-mail address and phone number are below. He seems very well connected, so I look forward to speaking with him.

Please let me know if you have any more questions,
Ray

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Request for Methanol from Busan to Daesan
email_chain.body:
Hello Natalie,

I have 15,000MT of methanol that I would like to send from Busan to Daesan. Please confirm the details and if there are any updates on the project.

email_chain.subject: Request for Spot LNG Cargo
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Shaw, we require a spot LNG cargo from Qatar to China in one week. If we order 80,000 MMscf now, can you agree to a 20,000 MMscf allocation if it arrives too late? Thank you, Ramya

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Spot LNG Cargo
email_chain.body: Hi Ramya, thank you for your email. Our latest data suggests you should be able to secure a spot cargo to China. The seller says it may take up to one week to source but we can expect it in 6 days. Is that acceptable? Thank you, Olivia

email_chain.subject: Request for Carrier Service
email_chain.body:
Hey Mr. Bond,

We need a carrier for a container of tuna from Hobart to Halifax. Do you have any ideas?

Thanks,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Carrier Service
email_chain.body: Yes sir, I have a vessel that can do the job. I am quite familiar with the tide, especially when there is a full moon. I have also noted that you used our own world at first glance. Let me give you the names and numbers of the pilot service in Halifax. We are quite familiar with their resources. We need to discuss this in detail with you before it can proceed. We are here to serve you, but it would not be prudent for you to go ahead without making sure that we can provide what you need in terms of our services, as well as for your ship. Hope to hear from you soon.

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Carrier Service
email_chain.body: I'd like to talk with you. How can we set this up? Do you mind if I discuss this with my assistant, Mr. Dougherty? I'd like to include him. If not, can we go ahead?

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Carrier Service
email_chain.body:
Great! We can meet at 10:00am tomorrow in your lobby. I think the meeting will last until noon. I'll have him look into the options we discussed for the trip. There will be a cost involved in doing this, and I am sure he will outline the expenses for the various costs. Can you give me an idea of the cost for this trip? Thanks!

Anthony

email_chain.subject: Request for Assistance in Transporting Lobsters
email_chain.body:
Hi Dwight,

I am Anthony, the CEO of Blue Car, a lobster exporter from Halifax. We have been delivering lobsters to the entire world for over 20 years now. I am writing to request assistance with the possibility of transporting our lobsters to the Middle East. Do you have any suggestions for how to go about this?

Thanks,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Assistance in Transporting Lobsters
email_chain.body:
Good morning Anthony,

It is possible to ship lobster to the Middle East, but it will take a lot of time. This includes transporting the lobsters to the port of Halifax, and then having them transported to the port of Dubai. I am not familiar with the cost of shipping lobsters to Dubai, but I am sure it will be expensive. Do you have any suggestions for how to reduce the costs? Also, I have a meeting with the management of Bond Carriers at 10am tomorrow. I would like to discuss this in more detail then. Please contact me via email or call me at (Tel #). We can discuss this further at that time.

Best regards,
Dwight

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Assistance in Transporting Lobsters
email_chain.body:
Dear Dwight,

Blue Car, as a leading manufacturer of lobsters in the world, we are always looking for better and more efficient methods of transporting our lobsters. We have noticed that there is a lack of knowledge regarding the transport of lobsters to the Middle East.

Thanks,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Assistance in Transporting Lobsters
email_chain.body:
Hi Anthony,

The transport of lobsters to the Middle East will definitely be expensive. The cost will be influenced by a number of factors, such as the location of the Middle East, the seasonality of the lobsters, the type of containers used for transporting the lobsters, and the type of transportation used. The cost of transporting the lobsters from Halifax to the Middle East will depend on the availability of carriers and the cost of each carrier. If you want to discuss the specifics of transporting lobsters to the Middle East, I would recommend that you contact a shipping company that specializes in transporting lobster. For example, we work with Carriers USA.

Best regards,
Dwight

email_chain.subject: Rapeseed Oil Shipment Enquiry
email_chain.body:
G’day Matueo,

Do you have any capacity for 4,000MT of rapeseed oil from Gdańsk to Aqaba by the end of May?

Thanks!
Lian

email_chain.subject: Palm Oil Shipment Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Captain Matueo,

Many thanks for your email. I would like to negotiate on another of your offers for ship carriage of 2,500MT of refined palm oil from Port Kelang to Algeciras by the end of May. Hope to hear from you.

Maria

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Rapeseed Oil Offer
email_chain.body:
Lian,

I’d like to clarify your offer. I must mention that the oil cargo is still waiting for a buyer in a warehouse in London, which is already 4,000MT. The price is not competitive as the port will charge you 30 Euros/MT. Then again, the margin you make will still be around 150,000 Euros, I understand this and would like to proceed. You can provide us with the balance you will need for ship hire and insurance.

Thanks!
Matueo

email_chain.subject: Payment Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Customer,

We are pleased to inform you that we have received a full payment of $300,000 as indicated in your email. Therefore, we have duly released your cargo from storage. Please note that you will receive 70% of the total invoice by the end of this week and the rest by the end of the next week.

Your Reference No.: XXXXXXXXXXXX.

FALCO SHIPPING & LOGISTICS PTE LTD.
Jane Doe: Director

email_chain.subject: Payment Request
email_chain.body:
Lian,

I have just checked with the bank and our account balance is zero. My enquiry is that what is the balance we need to pay to you?

Thanks!
Matueo

email_chain.subject: Potential Shipment of 5,000MT Refined Petroleum Products
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Williams,

We need to clear 5,000MT of refined petroleum products from Rotterdam to Port Sudan. Our purchase is subject to your best available freight rates and confirmed loading. Do you see any issues with congestion or pricing?

Regards,
Ann

email_chain.subject: Re: Potential Shipment of 5,000MT Refined Petroleum Products
email_chain.body:
Dear Ann,

We cannot accept your offer for delivery of 5000 MT of petroleum products from Rotterdam to Port Sudan. We are not permitted to tranship petroleum products through Rotterdam due to government regulations. Therefore, we would prefer to be booked directly to Port Sudan on a FOB basis.

Thanks and best regards,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Potential Shipment of 5,000MT Refined Petroleum Products
email_chain.body:
Hi Andrew,

Regarding our offer for 5000 MT of petroleum products from Rotterdam to Port Sudan, I am sorry to inform you that the offer is for a delivery of petroleum products not in accordance with our shipping regulations. We require only petroleum products that have been shipped directly to Port Sudan on a FOB basis. Therefore, your offer is not acceptable.

Regards,
Ann

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Soybean Release from Boston to Tangier
email_chain.body:

I'm inquiring about the release of 8,500MT of 1st grade soybeans from Boston, with destination Tangier. It would be useful to know when your current charter will be clear.

Regards,
Jessica

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Soybean Release from Boston to Tangier
email_chain.body:
Hi Jessica,

Thanks for your inquiry. Are there any more details that you can provide? I'm thinking we could get this done by mid June for the high season.

Thanks again,
Kevin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Soybean Release from Boston to Tangier
email_chain.body:

Yes, the soybean cargo is available, and we can leave it clear for you. I will contact you shortly with more details.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Soybean Release from Boston to Tangier
email_chain.body:

You can charter 8,500 MT of 1st grade soybeans from Boston with destination Tangier. We can leave it clear at any time after we get the charter.

Anil

Kim

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Cargo Request
email_chain.body:

The place of delivery is Quayside Terminal, Singapore. Can you deliver there?

Best,

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Cargo Request
email_chain.body:
Hi Anil,

The Quayside Terminal in Singapore works well for me. I have never had any issues with them before. I will be at the terminal around 9 am. Do you need to be there as well?

Best,
Kim

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Cargo Request
email_chain.body:
Hi Kim,

Yeah, I will be there around 9 am too. I will see you there. See you then,

Best,
Anil

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Availability
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

We need a vessel for 7,300MT of liquefied petroleum gas from Bahrain to Mina Al Ahmadi. Could you advise on your next open laycan, and do you accept lumpsum deals?

Regards,
Tiana

email_chain.subject: Vessel Availability and L/C Arrangement
email_chain.body:
The vessel 8022 is due to arrive in Manama on 1/14/2015. It would be possible to arrange with a trader who is willing to sign a L/C for the full tonnage (7,300MT) as well as sign a L/C against a small proforma invoice. Please find an email below to the vessel manager on this vessel. If you are interested in taking up this trade, please advise your intended tonnage and you will be provided with the vessel manager’s contact information and account number to send the proforma invoice to.

Regards,
Tiana

email_chain.subject: Proforma Invoice and Letter of Credit
email_chain.body:
The vessel 8022 has received our proforma invoice of 7,300MT and has requested a Letter of Credit to be sent on our account number 421123. Could you advise on how to go about this please?

Regards,
Tiana

email_chain.subject: Letter of Credit and Balance Transfer
email_chain.body:
I have sent the letter of credit for this deal to the supplier. I have attached a copy below. The balance has been transferred to your account. Could you please confirm that you have received the letter of credit and the details of the two letters of credit sent by your trade facilitation department to your account. Kindly acknowledge if you have received the letters of credit and if so, the time frame in which they will be available.

Regards,
Tiana

email_chain.subject: Re: Letter of Credit and Balance Transfer
email_chain.body: Thank you for your reply. As I informed you, the facility department has sent 2 separate letters of credit, one for the supplier and the other for a shipping line. The letters of credit have not been sent to your account yet. I will send them once they have been processed. Please do not worry, the letters of credit will be sent as soon as the papers have been processed.

email_chain.subject: Balance Transfer Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Our company will be transferring the remaining balance of 14000USD to your account in 2 days. Please acknowledge if you have received the balance transfer or send an email to confirm the money transfer.

Thank you.

email_chain.subject: Re: Balance Transfer Confirmation
email_chain.body: Your balance transfer has been received. The payment will be deposited to your account in a few hours. Thank you.

email_chain.subject: Final Confirmation
email_chain.body: The transfer of 14000USD has been received and deposited to your account. Thank you. The contract has been signed and delivered to your company in a few hours.

email_chain.subject: Vessel Status and Payment Update
email_chain.body: Your letter of credit has been processed and is ready. Please note that we have updated your balance transfer and it has been transferred to your account in your name. Your vessel is currently traveling in the Pacific Ocean and is scheduled to arrive in the Arabian Gulf in a few days. The total price will be 7,300MT x 14000USD/MT = 102290000 USD. You have made a net payment of 102290000 USD. 14000 USD remains to be paid. Thank you. Your balance transfer of 14000 USD has been received and your payment will be deposited to your account in 2 days. Your vessel has arrived in the Arabian Gulf and is waiting for instructions.

email_chain.subject: Rescheduling MGK81 Shipment

Yours,
Cressida

email_chain.body:

Thanks for your quick response. We can have it delivered to Dusseldorf tomorrow. Please confirm and verify the authenticity of the invoice and prepare the documents so that we can proceed to pay.

Yours,
Walther

email_chain.subject: Re: Rescheduling MGK81 Shipment
email_chain.body:

Cressida

Daniel James

email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for 6,000MT of Sugar from Santos to Rotterdam

I trust you will not mind my reiterating on behalf of my clients regarding your inquiry. Regarding the M/T charter of sugar from Santos to Rotterdam at a minimum laycan buffer of 90 days as per your proposal, we require 6,000MT to be delivered within 21 days.

We have to seek a quick approval from our internal committee and then only can I provide you with further details of this requirement.

If you require any further details or have any queries on this, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Thank you,
Cherie

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Coal Transport from Felixstowe to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Jackson,

Could you let me know what is the leading inland point for coal from Felixstowe to Rotterdam in July?

I hope to speak with you soon,

Melissa

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Coal Transport from Felixstowe to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Melissa,

There are a variety of ways to get coal to Rotterdam:

The first is rail from Felixstowe to The Hook where it is loaded onto barges.
The second is by sea.
However, the leading inland point for coal from Felixstowe to Rotterdam in July is via rail.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Sincerely,

Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Coal Transport from Felixstowe to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Andrew,

Thank you for taking the time to write to me.
I appreciate the information and look forward to working with you in the future.

Best regards,

Melissa

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Coal Transport from Felixstowe to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Melissa,

It was a pleasure speaking with you.
Feel free to call me anytime.

Best,

Andrew

email_chain.subject: Thank You

Melissa

email_chain.subject: Promotional Opportunities and Summer Sale
email_chain.body:
I think it would be very helpful to add the following:
1. Open houses or webinars that are available.
2. Written guides to FESCO's various operations.
3. Other marketing opportunities that the company has.

You might consider:
The European Summer Sale with 60% off the list rates for all containers booked by July 20th, 2019. In addition, all European shipments booked before September 1st will receive an additional discount of 25%. Contact your account manager to learn more about this promotion.

If you're looking for summer destinations, we also have low rates to Portugal.

For more information, please contact me.

Sincerely,
Diane

email_chain.subject: Re: Promotional Opportunities and Summer Sale
email_chain.body:
Thanks for the information on the special rate. I will add that to my projects. I do have a question about the promotion for rail and ocean. Can you provide more details? Is this only for Europe to North America? Also, can you tell me the details of the rail promotion? Is this for all rail or for certain rail lines?

Thanks,
Sandy

email_chain.subject: Re: Promotional Opportunities and Summer Sale
email_chain.body:
You asked about the rail promotion. This promotion applies to any rail mode in any direction. It only applies to shippers who book before July 20th. Here is a sample of the promotion that can be added to an email or web banner. This sample promotion applies to east coast shippers only, but it is up to you what direction you want to promote.

Sorry, you cannot apply this special rate to shipments within North America. Special ocean promotions for service to the U.S. East Coast.

In the United States, what you consider the east coast is a very large area. It includes New York, Philadelphia, Boston, Baltimore, Wilmington, Richmond, Norfolk, Charleston, Savannah, Jacksonville, Miami, New Orleans, Houston, Galveston, Mobile, and New York City. Special ocean promotions for service to the U.S. West Coast.

It is great to hear that you are including different areas in your marketing. We also have promotion available to several ports on the west coast including the following ports: Los Angeles, Long Beach, Tacoma, Seattle, Portland, San Francisco, Oakland, Richmond, and Wilmington. We also have ports in the Gulf of Mexico that you may want to consider adding such as: Mobile, Gulfport, New Orleans, and Houston.

I will add the link below so you can see all of our locations.
http://www.silverferries.com/lotes

email_chain.subject: Re: Promotional Opportunities and Summer Sale
email_chain.body:
I have added the rail promotion to the bottom of my emails. I will review the list of ports in the Gulf Coast area and add that to my email for customers in that area. Please let me know if there is anything else I can do for you.

Thanks,
Sandy

email_chain.subject: Re: Promotional Opportunities and Summer Sale
email_chain.body: I will contact you shortly to make arrangements for the site visit.

email_chain.subject: Re: Promotional Opportunities and Summer Sale
email_chain.body:
Thanks for the information on the summer sale. I have included this in my email to customers. I'm not sure what you mean by 'Low rates to Portugal'. If you are referring to lower transportation rates for the summer months, then this promotion is only for shipments booked by July 20th, 2019. For more information on this promotion, please contact your account manager.

Thanks,
John

email_chain.subject: Charter Offer for 10.5 Days at Port in Busan
email_chain.body:
Hi Luca,

I'm happy to provide you with a charter offer for 10.5 days at port in Busan. Please refer to the attached schedule. A window of opportunity is now open and the 10.5-day charter may be secured with an ETA port in Hong Kong on May 3rd. 6 units of 1,750m3 each are available for delivery and the charter cost for 3 weeks is USD 8,400,000.

Sincerely,
Davin

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Charter Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Luca,

Based on the schedule in Attachment 1, please accept our offer of 1 x 1,750m3 at a rate of USD 1,800.00 per cubic meter per day. This constitutes a total of USD 3,650,000.00. Please acknowledge receipt of this offer with an answer no later than 4.5 hours from the time of receipt of this e-mail.

Fabio

email_chain.subject: Availability of Ricka Maru for Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body:
Ms. Lin,

We’re arranging 20,000MT of sugar from Kobe to Ma’anshan. We have space available on the Ricka Maru on 15 May. Could you inform us if the vessel is available for your cargo?

Yours truly,
Don

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability of Ricka Maru for Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Don,

I’ve been trying to reach you to find out about the vessel Ricka Maru. We have space available on this vessel and will be leaving port on 19 April. If you could confirm availability, then I can place our order.

Thank you,
Jona

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability of Ricka Maru for Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body:
Thanks for your message.

We are currently short of space, but we are expecting 40,000MT of sugar from Vietnam to Kobe soon. That will clear up some of our space requirements.

Best regards,
Scotty

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability of Ricka Maru for Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body:
Thank you for the good news.

As you know, our customer’s expectations are high and tight schedules are required. We will therefore need to start taking bookings again as soon as possible. We will require 10,000MT of sugar from Kobe to Tianjin port in China within the next 15 days. Our firm is prepared to pay a premium for immediate availability.

Please let us know if the Ricka Maru is available.

Best regards,
Sean

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability of Ricka Maru for Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sean,

Unfortunately, I’m afraid the Ricka Maru isn’t available for your cargo at the moment. I am able to offer you a few other vessels for consideration, but I’m afraid that will mean delaying your delivery schedule by a couple of days. I will therefore send you a list of the vessels I have available along with the estimated delivery schedules.

email_chain.subject: Request for Charter Vessel
email_chain.body:
Mr. Martinez,

We need to charter a vessel from Tangier to Halifax. Please find below our cargo requirements: 20,000MT of iron ore. Our preferred loading port is Bremerhaven, and we would need to pick up another 15,000MT in Lagos before sailing to Halifax.

Could you please give us your best price and the lead time to loading?

Thanks,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Charter Vessel
email_chain.body:
Mr. Alex,

Thank you for your previous inquiry regarding the transportation of your iron ore from Bremerhaven, Germany to Lagos, Nigeria and Halifax, Canada. We will be delighted to carry your cargo and will be happy to assist you with all of your logistics requirements.

Our current lead time to loading is approximately 10 to 12 weeks. At the time of loading, our best port rates will be $4.00 USD per metric ton. The additional 15,000MT in Lagos will incur an additional $1.00 USD per metric ton. At this time, we will be more than happy to work with you to bring the rates in line with your requirements.

Please send us an email with your confirmation and any additional details.

Best regards,
Mr. Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Charter Vessel
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Martinez,

I am writing in regards to your quote for the chartering of the MV Unknown from Tangier to Halifax for a trip that will include an intermediate port in Lagos. I would like to place this charter order but there are some issues I need to resolve before I can send you payment.

The first issue is the floating rate, which appears to have jumped up since your last communication. I'm worried that the final rate may exceed our budget. Could you please provide me with the current floating rate, in USD, and the cost of living in the intermediate port? I would like to know these details before I can give you the final go-ahead.

The second issue is the lead time to loading, which is unfortunately too long for my project timeline. I will need this vessel as soon as possible. Could you please expedite the process?

Thanks,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Charter Vessel
email_chain.body:
Mr. Martinez,

The 20,000MT of iron ore will be loaded on the MV Unknown in Bremerhaven. The additional 15,000MT will be picked up in Lagos. You are the only firm that was able to give me an exact lead time to loading.

Please provide me with your rate. I would like to approve the chartering of the MV Unknown by next week.

Your floating rate appears to be a little high. The floating rate in London, where I will need the MV Unknown to pick up iron ore, is $1.50 per metric ton. I feel that you should be charging a comparable rate.

Thanks,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Agreement for Cargo Transportation
email_chain.body:

Attached you will find the details of our previous discussion about our services and cooperation in future on schedule cargo transportation. If you still have any questions or wish to make an amendment to this contract, please don't hesitate to contact us as soon as possible.

Also, attached you will find some general conditions of your cooperation with us, as well as some private conditions which may be added to your or our benefit. Please fill them in and send to us for review and approval.

The form of payment is as per our standard General Conditions 9-11 which can be also viewed in the attached file; however, we would recommend the payment in favor of the opening European bank account of our company.

Best regards,
Mr. Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote on Palm Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Charles,

Yes, it’s confirmed! I’d recommend choosing Neptun (NEO3), which is a hybrid vessel with very low port draft. There’s no draft limitation for NEO3 when discharging in the deepwater port.

Best regards,
Tiffany Yu

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote on Palm Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Tiffany,

Thanks for your quick response. For the product I’m going to import (yarn and socks, very bulky), which port would you recommend for discharging and costing me the least in terms of draft and manpower?

Thanks!

Best regards,
Charles Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote on Palm Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Charles,

If you can afford to spend time in the port, we’d recommend leaving the vessel out for 4 days in Nanjing (Nanj). This will allow the vessel to reach maximum draft in Nanjing and improve its discharge efficiency. Since Nanjing has lower costs for manpower and cargo handling, and Shanghai has lower draft and terminal fees, we’d recommend starting the discharging from Nanjing.

Best regards,
Tiffany Yu

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote on Palm Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Tiffany,

We have great intentions to work with your company. Thank you for your advice and if possible, could you forward your contact to the right department?

Best regards,
Charles Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote on Palm Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Charles,

Please find our contact details below:

+65 6225 2226
Tiffany Yu (General Manager)

Best regards,
Tiffany Yu

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Kolhe Deal
email_chain.body:
Good evening Mr. Gates,

On my flight out of Moscow this morning, I was approached by a former Kolhe industrial sales rep who assured me that you would never consider giving Kolhe a deal like the one they are offering me. He intimated that if I were to mention this conversation to the right people, my activities would be looked on very favorably.

Would you mind discussing this matter with me and letting me know whether you think he is correct?

Best regards,
Sean Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Regarding Kolhe Deal
email_chain.body:
This is to follow up on your letter of the 27th, requesting a meeting.

Kolhe would like to offer you a very low price for the new wave of ignition tubes we will have available in March. The current bid that Kolhe has for this particular area is for 1 million kits at $200 each. Kolhe is very willing to cut a deal in which you will get the tubes for $100 per kit if you place the order now, and will pay $1 million for an additional 500,000 kits when you are ready to place the final order. You will also need to commit to providing us with ten million more tubes a year, each one for $200.

This plan will ensure that Kolhe will have a dependable source of income until we can start producing the tubes ourselves. It will give you time to both double your income as well as cut your costs.

email_chain.subject: Request for Assistance
email_chain.body:
Received as follows:

This letter shall be void if not received by 15 September 2001. The contents of this letter must not be divulged to third parties.

Dear Mr. Gates,

I am a patient of the State Department of Public Health in New York. Recently, a court order was granted for my records to be confiscated. I have appealed this action and am fighting this order.

I have forwarded copies of this letter to the Office of the Inspector General and I would request your assistance in this matter.

I would like to request the following:
- Your assistance in this matter.
- To let the Inspector General and the State Department of Public Health know that the 15-day deadline is unconstitutional and unethical.
- The records you confiscated are being held at the State Department of Public Health.

Any copies of those

email_chain.body:

Your letter arrived today and I apologize for the delay in my reply.

To be honest, I have put your question on the backburner for a couple of days, and have since forgotten about it. I cannot tell you whether or not I am truly at 100% capacity, because it has been nearly twenty years since I have had a serious medical examination. I do know that I have been drinking constantly for almost the past year, which has caused my heart rate to accelerate to over 120 BPM (about 85 for a healthy individual).

email_chain.subject: Shipping Ginger Essential Oil
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Shan,

We are shipping 33,000L of ginger essential oil from San Francisco to Taipei in 12” drums. We’re hoping to use your refrigerated containers, since it’s a perishable product. Is this possible?

Kind regards,
Kate

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Ginger Essential Oil
email_chain.body:
Dear Kate,

Thank you for your email. We’re delighted to hear from you and are happy to assist.

The best type of refrigerated container is an ISO Container, which is a specially designed shipping container. These can hold temperature-sensitive products of all kinds. We’ve shipped over 80,000 cartons of liquid chocolate spread for one of the UK’s largest chocolate makers, and shipped 11,000 cans of spray paint from Belgium to the UK.

We can provide you with a full ISO container for your ginger essential oil, which will ensure that it arrives at your destination in perfect condition. We can pick the container up from your warehouse and deliver it to your preferred shipping port. Your oil is safe with us.

Thanks again for getting in touch. If you have any more questions or queries, please don’t hesitate to get in touch.

Kind regards,
Mr. Shan

email_chain.subject: Dry Ice Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello,

I was wondering how much a dry ice shipment would cost to ship from Chicago to Hong Kong. Would a 20ft container be needed?

Kind regards,
Stacy

email_chain.subject: Re: Dry Ice Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Stacy,

Thank you for your email.

The dry ice shipment you’re referring to is a refrigerated container. We’ve shipped 10,000 cans of spray paint and 6,500 liters of flour from the UK to Denmark in one such container. To do this, we need an ISO container. ISO stands for International Standards Organisation, the body that standardizes the design of shipping containers. ISO containers have many advantages over other types of containers, particularly their airtight seal, which means they can be filled with dry ice (or any type of refrigerant) and frozen to a very low temperature. This makes them perfect for your needs.

Kind regards,
Mr. Shan

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Ginger Essential Oil
email_chain.body:
Dear Kate,

I’m glad to hear that you are interested in using one of our ISO refrigerated containers to ship your ginger oil from San Francisco to Taipei. I’ve attached a price list for our service, so you can get an idea of the costs involved.

Our shipping prices vary depending on the size of the container (40’ or 20’) and the distance between your warehouse in San Francisco and the nearest port where we can pick the container up. You can see a list of the ports that we serve, as well as the closest ones to your location. Our cargo can be moved using road, rail, sea, or air, so we can ship your ginger essential oil via the most efficient route. We currently offer shipping to more than 200 countries and territories.

Kind regards,
Mr. Shan

email_chain.body:

Kind regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: Wheat Purchase 20MT
email_chain.body:

Yes, we have 20MT ready for delivery on February 15. FOB price is 141 USD, Shanghai shipping rates are 25 USD per MT, and our rates will be 33.75 USD per MT, incoterms FOB = EXW.

We need one buyer who is prepared to pay the buying cost plus shipping cost.

If you accept our price, we can arrange delivery from Shanghai to your port.

Please confirm ASAP.

In advance thanks,
Mylene

email_chain.subject: Re: Wheat Purchase 20MT
email_chain.body:
Thanks Mylene for the quick reply. We are interested in purchasing your wheat.

Please provide your bank account details so that we can arrange to wire the funds for the delivery to you on the 15th.

We will have the 20MT delivered in 30 days from the date of the invoice. We will invoice in Canadian dollars and your company can invoice in RMB. Your company will arrange the shipping from Shanghai to Montreal.

Kind regards,
Travis

email_chain.body:

Are those figures available?

Sharon

This is a political project, and political projects rely on political skills.

The earliest I’ll be able to make a presentation is 21st November.

Please advise.

Celeste

Our supplier is on schedule to start production the week of 25th May. However, please note that this is subject to market price changes. 1,000MT of Urea is currently available at US$371 per MT FOB. Sales Team

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Alaska State Tax Ruling on Ethanol
email_chain.body:

Thanks,
Oliver

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Alaska State Tax Ruling on Ethanol
email_chain.body:
Hello Oliver,

Thank you for your recent inquiry. We are pleased to share the attached information that addresses your question about the pending tax ruling and its impact on ethanol shipping rates.

If you have any further questions, please feel free to contact us at your earliest convenience.

Thank you for your understanding and assistance.

Sincerely,
Mollie Harrison, Regional Manager
Alaska State Tax Department

email_chain.subject: Alaska Fuel Tax on Ethanol
email_chain.body:
As a company committed to helping Alaska achieve energy independence by supporting the development and production of cleaner, lower-emission fuels, we need your support to maintain our rates for ethanol and fuel additives shipped to Alaska.

Currently, we’re able to offer discounted ethanol and additive rates because the Alaska fuel tax does not differentiate between ethanol and petroleum-based products. However, this is set to change if a new state law is passed, which will allow ethanol to be taxed at 60 percent of the full price.

As a result, we would need to adjust our current rates and pass through a corresponding tax to ensure compliance with the new law. We can also help reduce your costs by absorbing the tax until June 30, 2023, but if the current rate remains unchanged, your fuel costs will increase significantly.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
Pacific Ethanol

email_chain.subject: FW: Alaska Fuel Tax on Ethanol
email_chain.body:
Please find attached an email response from Pacific Ethanol, a supplier of ethanol and biodiesel, regarding a change in the state tax ruling in Alaska which could affect our decision to ship ethanol there.

[Some companies place this as a hyperlink. This content may be on the corporate website.]

Best regards,
Oliver

email_chain.subject: Shipment Inquiry for Adhesives
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lie, 

We need a 3,400MT shipment of adhesives from Rotterdam to Lübeck in early October. Can you advise on your earliest loading date? 

Best, 
Jan

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Inquiry for Adhesives
email_chain.body:
Hello Jan, 

Thank you for your email. Our first available 3,400MT loading date is October 4th, but please note that this is a Monday and typically our slowest week of the month. 

If you want to expedite the shipment, we can try to arrange it for October 2nd or even October 1st. However, the October 1st option is on our limited summer sailing schedule and would require a larger vessel than usual. The October 2nd option is on our regular schedule but may involve a full vessel with less throughput. 

We can confirm the loading dates by October 7th, so you will have clarity on the arrangements. 

Please confirm your choice so we can provide an invoice. 

Best, 
Lie Best
