email_chain.body: Hi, We have 25kmt of coffee beans to send to Chennai. What freight do you quote and is laytime negotiable beyond 6 days? Thanks, Linda

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote and Laytime Negotiation
email_chain.body: Linda, Greetings! 1. Transportation is not negotiable. The cargo should be delivered and paid for within the following time frame: a. To be delivered between the 21st and 25th November to Coffee Chennai. 2. We want this to be shipped from Ecuador, but your specific shipping method will not affect the price of the cargo. We prefer if this were sent to be delivered within 21 to 25 November to Chennai. We have been working with Albrecht and Petersons since August 2015 to ship 7 containers of coffee for our export business which is Roast Coffee (Trigon) Pvt Ltd. Please find their contact details below: Martin Peterson: +49 1512 3664097, Isabell Schmied: +49 163 9431815.

email_chain.subject: Invoice Verification
email_chain.body: Here is the attached form and also attached the photos. Kindly confirm on the same. Thank you, Hiya. Attached is the one Invoice we have from you and need you to verify, it looks like they sent one invoice but could be two if that is the case kindly let us know.

Could you please provide me an estimate for the transportation of 5,000 MT of wheat from Savannah to Guatemala via deep draft vessel? Which ports in each country are appropriate? Also, what are the approximate days this would take to clear customs? Please advise, we want to start this project immediately. Kind Regards, Phil

email_chain.subject: Request for Estimate
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Oakley, Please send me an estimate for the following transportation: 3,000 MT of wheat to Houston and 2,000 MT of sugar to Guatemala. Best regards, Philip

email_chain.subject: Request for Estimate

email_chain.subject: Ready to Load Wood Chips
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Dang,

I have a fully laden vessel ready to be loaded with wood chips from Laem Chabang. Please let me know when you're ready to load.

Inge

email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Dang,

I am in London and I have a container with the contents shown in my attached photos ready to be transported to Laem Chabang. I hope to load the container on 1st May, but I am not sure that I will be able to go to Thailand as the cargo cannot be in the container for very long.

I will wait to hear from you.

Best regards,
Barry

email_chain.subject: Loading of Vessel BAZULAR
email_chain.body:
Hello Barry,

Our vessel will be loading wood chips from Laem Chabang starting on Monday 9th May.

For BAZULAR:
    South side        (5400 cbm)
    North side        (5400 cbm)
    #1 deck        (400 cbm)
    #2 deck        (200 cbm)

If this is ok, let me know as soon as possible.

Best regards,
Inge

email_chain.subject: Re: Loading of BAZULAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Inge,

Thanks for your email.

How many tonnes of wood chips can be loaded onto the vessel? I would like to purchase all of the wood chips available.

Thanks,
Barry

email_chain.subject: Re: Loading of BAZULAR
email_chain.body:
Hello Barry,

Thank you for your email.

110000 tons of wood chips will be loaded on the vessel. If this is ok with you, I would like to confirm the final date of loading so that I can confirm to the shipper. This vessel is scheduled to leave Laem Chabang on 12th May but due to wind conditions the vessel may not leave until 15th May.

I would like to confirm the date of loading as soon as possible so that I can tell the shipper.

Best regards,
Inge

email_chain.subject: Request for Information on Truck Dimensions and Fees
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Warren,

When your ship arrives in New Orleans, we would like to send you 50 tons of industrial chemicals by truck. Could you please provide me with the following information?

1. What are the truck dimensions of your ship, and is it subject to any fees?
2. If so, what are they and how are they calculated?
3. Do you have any spare capacity?

Thanks in advance for your information.

Regards,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Shipment Details and Costs
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Warren,

We have shipped 50 tons of chemicals to your ship, and the truck costs are as follows:

- Freight paid to your ship: 10,000 U.S. dollars
- Other fees: 12,000 U.S. dollars
- Tankage: 5,000 U.S. dollars
- Spare capacity: 3,000 U.S. dollars

Total: 30,000 U.S. dollars

Thank you for your services, and we look forward to another business opportunity with you in the future.

Best regards,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Email Template Issue
email_chain.body:
I'm trying to make these sentences go into email templates, but I'm having a lot of difficulty with the formatting. What I've done so far is as follows:

Make an email template called 1:
{{Name}}
Dear {{Name}},
{{Message 1}}
{{Message 2}}
Regards,
{{Name}}

And then make
Email 3:
{{Email 1}}

You can see the errors by viewing the pages.

The email I'm trying to send is to the above:

Mr. Warren
Dear Mr. Warren,
When your ship arrives in New Orleans, we would like to send you 50 tons of industrial chemicals by truck. Could you please give me the following information?
What truck dimensions does your ship have, and is it subject to any fees? If so, what are they and how are they calculated?
Do you have any spare capacity?
Thanks in advance for your information.
Regards,
Tom

Please send your response back to my email.

email_chain.subject: Testing Email Template
email_chain.body:
Test Email - Open this link to receive this test email: <http://www.emailx.net/en/testemail.htm>

This should work (This link does not, and that's what I want to fix, not that it's not working. That's the default behaviour.)

You can see the error if you preview the page:

The {{#if condition}} was detected in {{Email 3}} template, but is always true and cannot be prevented with: {{! condition|empty}}

Because the condition is not empty, it doesn't print anything, so there's nothing to replace with a fallback.

My company in Sao Paulo (Brazil) will accept only 90% of our total order. Could you make it 95% by the deadline? Can you come through for us?

Best,
Laura

What would be the delivery time from Porto Alegre to New York? Is it possible to deliver cargo by the deadline?

Best,
Tokai

We will be stuck in a desert. Is your company able to load 100MT in just four days? How many hours of shipment can you complete this?

email_chain.subject: Re: Flour Shipment from Shanghai to Singapore

Could your company reduce the freight cost by $500? How much can you reduce it by?

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Lina,

I received your email, and it's true that your cargo is very small for our vessels, but I'm happy to look into it. Could you please confirm the final quantities, and if you're able to provide a discharge port of Penang within two weeks?

Would you mind also sharing the location, timing, and mode of the loadout? We are looking to transship to a subsea FPSO in Mozambique.

Kind regards,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Mike,

Thank you for your email. It's good to know you're willing to accept our freight. I think we can agree on the agreed price of $1,500.00 per item.

Please find below the details:
Location: The Pasir Panjang Terminal, Singapore
Port: Singapore
Cargo mode: Bulk cargo
Unit of measure: in tonnes
Starting date of load out: 1st November 2018
Ending date of load out: 2nd November 2018
Number of containers: 4,724 units
Number of cargo items: 6,756 items
Quantity: 248 tons
Unit price per ton: $1,500.00

We are willing to cover 70% of the freight.

Once again, thank you for accepting our offer. We're excited to make this work.

Kind regards,
Lina

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Lina,

You mentioned that you would like to cover 70% of the freight. Could you please share the details of your cargo that would fall into this category? Additionally, do you have a fixed freight payment schedule?

Kind regards,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Freight Rate Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body: We have a 5,200MT fertilizer shipment ready from Tangshan to Sharjah, DXB. Could you advise your best freight rate and let me know if weekend loadings are acceptable? Thank you, Sonny

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Sonny, Thank you for your inquiry. We have received your email and would like to discuss this further to see if we can work together. We have agents in Tangshan and terminals in Dubai, UAE, along with our own ships. We are happy to handle the bulk cargo shipment between China and the UAE. Please provide more details such as the port of loading and unloading, cargo type, etc. We would be honored to earn your business. Regards, Manager

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Manager, We have decided to book your service. Please accept my apologies for not giving you an opportunity earlier; I thought it was going to be a traditional tender. This is the first time I received an email quote from one of your agents. We will keep you updated on any developments. Regards, Sonny

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Sonny, We appreciate your confidence and interest in our services. We have extensive experience with these kinds of shipments. I would like to discuss further to ensure all details are as expected. In addition to our terminal in UAE, we have a new facility in Tangerang, Indonesia. Please let me know your preferences and availability. We look forward to further discussion. Regards, Manager

email_chain.subject: Freight Rate Inquiry for Dolomite and Gypsum Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Sonny, We have 2000MT of Dolomite and 2500MT of Gypsum cargo on board our vessel, looking for the market's best freight rate. Kindly let me know your best rates. We will have two loadings; the final loading will be 4-5 days before the vessel's arrival at Bahrain port. Shipping lines: Shipping line 1, Shipping line 2. Regards, Manager

Thank you,
Pedro

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Bitumen Shipment

Thank you for your response. It would be great if you can send me a firm quote for your product this time, and hopefully, I can close the deal with this shipment. Also, if there's a chance for you to provide a competitive quote for a dry bulk shipment, I would greatly appreciate that as well.

Thank you,
Pedro

Dear Captain Ford,

Thank you for your prompt response. I have reviewed your proposal and appreciate your ability to provide us with an accurate quote.

However, I have a question about the details of your quoted quantity. You mentioned a ship size of 20,000DWT for the first shipment. Is there a possibility to get a larger ship size for my second and third shipments? Also, is it possible to get a multi-user discount? Our fleet consists of six 10,000DWT vessels.

Thank you,
Pedro

email_chain.subject: Quote for Container Shipments

email_chain.subject: Verification of Trip Options and Surcharges
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Tan,

I am verifying the options for the trip of 1,700MT of PCBs from Jebel Ali to Thessaloniki at the end of April. I hope to find out if there are any additional surcharges that will apply.

Kind regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Verification of Trip Options and Surcharges
email_chain.body:
Hello Sarah,

We are currently holding the space for the voyage but do need confirmation of the full loaded quantity. We have made an estimate based on the final quantities provided. We will be able to confirm this when the final values have been received.

Please also confirm the acceptance of the following rates:
1. USD Sales L/C.
2. USD Sale on Board Terms
3. USD Arrival L/C.
4. USD Deferred L/C.

Kind regards,
Tan

email_chain.subject: Charges and Surcharge Details
email_chain.body:
Hello,

From the above email, please find enclosed the charges and surcharge details. The charges will be required to be pre-paid at the point of sale against a confirmed loading of shipment with 50% of the charges 30 days prior to the vessel sail date. The balance will be payable at loading and as you will have found attached to your B/L application the final.

Kind regards,
Tan

email_chain.subject: Re: Surcharge Detail
email_chain.body:
Dear Tan,

Thank you very much for your reply. We will get back to you with the final quantity before the end of the week.

Many thanks,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Request for STP and Terminal Rules Advice
email_chain.body:
Hi,

Would you be able to confirm your earliest date for an STP for 3,000MT of paper from Barcelona to Casablanca? Also, do you charge for your expert judgement to advise us on the terminal rules?

With best,
Ray

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for STP and Terminal Rules Advice
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your enquiry.

I am sorry but at this time our Operations team has no availability until January. Our charter rates can be viewed on the rate page on our website (please see link below) and these should be subject to Standard Charters terms & Conditions. As you will note, the rates are offered only on a per direction basis, so whilst we will be charging two-way rates, we will be allowing a few days turnaround at sea between the outward and return legs of the flight. Additionally, there is no charge for our expert advice on terminal rules and such like. We will contact you once availability has been confirmed and our rates have been reconfirmed.

Kind regards,
Vassili Kakias
Stuart Crossthwaite
e: vassili.kakias@standardcharters.com

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for STP and Terminal Rules Advice
email_chain.body:
Dear Stuart,

Thanks for confirming your availability to give advice on terminal rules. We have been doing a cost benefit analysis.

Best,
Ray

email_chain.subject: Query About Combining Freight and Return Slots
email_chain.body:
I trust you are well,

I was hoping you could help me out regarding this. Is it possible to combine freight items on an express charter, if so what rates apply?

I also have a query regarding return slots and consolidation of cargo. We would like to consolidate 3 flights of around 500 kgs each on one flight as this will reduce the amount of flights we need and associated costs and delivery times. What would be a reasonable request time for us to supply this service (3-4 days)?

Kind regards,
Kurt

email_chain.subject: Re: Query About Combining Freight and Return Slots
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your enquiry.

Regarding your first query, if you have two destinations and only want to travel once per cargo item and your freight exceeds 3,000kg, there will be a minimum charge of $5,000 to open up your freight as Standard Charters freight (see the link below for full information).

Regarding your second query, the Standard Charters will be 40 days turnaround per trip and for the return leg from airport to airport we will allow up to 5 days turnaround. Generally 3-4 days should be enough time to collect your cargo, unless of course you want to wait and collect together.

Kind regards,
Vassili Kakias

email_chain.subject: Quote Preparation
email_chain.body:
Dear Miss Karina,

Thank you for your inquiry. I have prepared a quote for you, which I would like to discuss with you.

Regards,
Jon

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Preparation
email_chain.body:
Dear Jon,

I would like to go ahead with my order based on the quote. I want 5 modules at 9 euros per module. Could you send it to me?

Regards,
Karina

email_chain.subject: Request for FOB Ex-Bucharest Quote
email_chain.body:
Mr. Omeh,

I've seen your rates, and I have a job for you. Can you please send me an FOB ex-Bucharest quote for 3,000MT, laycan mid-July, including who will cover port dues and LASH? I'd like to negotiate for a freight rate based on a non-Flexi term.

Thank you,
Artwork

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for FOB Ex-Bucharest Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Omeh,

Thank you for your FOB ex-Bucharest quote for a 3,000MT shipment. Please add a 5% surcharge for the non-Flexi term. The basis of this rate is Flexi. Please add the surcharge on the FOB ex-Bucharest quote and submit the revised quote to me.

Thank you,
Artwork

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on FOB Ex-Bucharest Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Omeh,

Thanks for sending the revised FOB ex-Bucharest rate, including the added $5,000 for not being on Flexi term. That's a pretty good price to purchase the cargo at. Could you please send the FOB ex-Bucharest contract rate so we can start negotiations? I was planning to purchase the cargo for FOB ex-Bucharest but this might be too expensive. Thank you for your FOB ex-Bucharest quote. I will take your rate under consideration and notify you shortly.

Thank you,
Artwork

email_chain.subject: Best Offer for FOB Ex-Bucharest
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Omeh,

Please find my best offer for 3,000MT of FOB ex-Bucharest starting 1 July. My basis is Flexi. I want the price to include loading and unloading port charges, insurance, and a margin based on a container rate.

Thank you,
Artwork

email_chain.subject: FOB Ex-Bucharest for 3,000MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Omeh,

I have found a buyer who wants to purchase your offer for the above-listed port. Could you please send me the lowest bid for FOB ex-Bucharest with 3,000MT delivery starting 15 July?

Thank you for your FOB ex-Bucharest quote,
Artwork

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Vessel Position and Berth Availability
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Quintero,

We have 2,500MT of industrial corn destined for Valencia from Surabaya. Could you confirm your earliest vessel position, and is a berth guaranteed on arrival?

Best,
Enrique

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Vessel Position and Berth Availability
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Enrique,

We will berth on Arrival 4 at 3pm with Fast 8 when we will arrive in Valencia on Sunday. I need to know your earliest dates, and your expected shipment weight.

Best,
Carlos

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Vessel Position and Berth Availability
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Carlos,

We have booked the first 1,500 MT but are expecting more. Our earliest dates are Feb 12-Mar 12, 15,000 MT per shipment. The vessel will depart on Feb 4.

Thank you for confirming the berth arrival.

Best,
Enrique

email_chain.subject: Bitumen Shipment from Rotterdam to Trieste
email_chain.body:
Hi Sven,

I’d like to schedule 11,200MT of bitumen from Rotterdam to Trieste. I’ve got plenty of time to load it in, so it doesn’t have to be a rush. Any price ideas?

Regards,
Andy

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Shipment from Rotterdam to Trieste
email_chain.body:
Hi Andy,

Ahhh, Rotterdam, my old hometown. That bitumen sounds like it was made for me. Thank you very much for your message.

How about 8 million euros for the deal?

I would like to give you a discount for you letting me call you “m’darling” in your email. But I’m afraid I won’t be able to do it if you let me pay the freight. I think you’ll forgive me?

Sincerely,
Sven

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Shipment from Rotterdam to Trieste
email_chain.body:
Hi Sven,

How about I give you a week to arrange delivery of this bitumen and then come back to you with a price.

If I am successful, will you discount my shipping cost with the discount I would have received if you’d paid?

I look forward to hearing from you.

Regards,
Andy

email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote and Estimate for Lagos to Benin

Mary

email_chain.subject: Cargo to Dar es Salaam Update
email_chain.body:
The cargo for Dar es Salaam is not going ahead due to a lack of market liquidity.

Best regards,
Rami

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo to Dar es Salaam Update
email_chain.body:
I received your email yesterday. After further research, the market is not a threat for the shipping of the furniture. This issue was one of many that delayed the start of the operation. We are currently in the process of getting the full list of issues and how we plan on fixing them. We will include this in the full presentation that will be sent to you in 2 weeks.

Thank you for taking the time to assist in getting the furniture off the plane. I have informed your colleagues of your situation. We are all grateful.

Best regards,
Recipient1

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo to Dar es Salaam Update
email_chain.body:
Hello,

If you have more emails or questions, just let me know and I would be happy to assist. I can help with fixing issues like this.

It's not enough to have a great idea. You need to have something that gets people excited about it and helps them think about it in a new way.

Maybe it is more than just a simple solution, but it's all worth it in the end.

If there is anything I can do to help, please feel free to reach out. Thank you.

Best regards,
Recipient1

email_chain.subject: Delivery Order
email_chain.body:
Here is the delivery order:
1. $50 for shipping - please send directly to Seattle.
2. $80 for payment and taxes - please send directly to Dar es Salaam.
3. $50 for initial hire - sent to both Seattle and Dar es Salaam.

Please make sure to send in the order you received it or else the finances will become problematic.

Thank you for your help,
Malia

email_chain.subject: Re: Delivery Order
email_chain.body:
Hello Malia,

Thank you for taking the time to answer my question, and I truly appreciate it.

However, I would just like to confirm that I will receive $80 to pay for the taxes on the $50 shipping and the $50 hire fee in total.

Thank you.

Best regards,
Rami

email_chain.subject: Re: Delivery Order
email_chain.body:
Dear Rami,

Thank you for your inquiry. I have attached a tax receipt for your $50 shipping fee.

Best regards,
Malia

email_chain.subject: Gelato Shipment from Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body:
Mark,

How about 3,300 MT of gelato from Naples to Melbourne? Should we start as a cargo hold, or can we split that 3 MT between the reefer plug and cargo hold?

Best,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Re: Gelato Shipment from Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body:
Excellent work today, guys. As I understand it, you've pre-bought 3,000 MT of gelato from Naples for the flight to Melbourne. We are going to have it arrive in Australia in time for the festival. We have until October, so we have plenty of time.

Now, if you ask me, it would be much better if the gelato arrived as part of a shipment of Neapolitan foodstuffs from Naples, or a plane with a load of gelato from Naples arriving in Australia. But whatever works, Daniel.

I would also like to order more gelato from Naples for our festivals in the future, as demand seems to have picked up since we started this thing. And before you ask, yes, there is a limit on gelato purchases from Naples. After all, the flood of gelato was somewhat unexpected.

Unfortunately,

email_chain.subject: Re: Gelato Shipment from Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body: Perhaps one day a three-car train will bring a smaller batch of gelato to Australia, but not today.

email_chain.subject: Re: Gelato Shipment from Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body: One final thing to consider: Many people in Australia like ice cream and do not like gelato. How much of the gelato are we going to send to Australia, and how much of the gelato are we going to send to Australia?

email_chain.subject: Re: Gelato Shipment from Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body: That’s a great question, Mark. We’ll sell the majority of the gelato, but we’ll donate some gelato to hospitals and nursing homes, especially ones in Western Australia.

email_chain.subject: Re: Gelato Shipment from Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body: Wonderful. I would like to introduce the idea of the Matilda Forest Festival, a collection of music, dance, and food festivals that would be held in the Matilda Forest, each lasting three days. People from around the world could come to the Matilda Forest and join us in the celebration of food and music.

email_chain.subject: Re: Gelato Shipment from Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body: With that said, we would need to negotiate with the forest residents to

email_chain.subject: Shipping Times for Shenzhen to Genoa

Mr. Smith,

My client wishes to begin exporting products from Shenzhen to Genoa. Could you advise available shipping times for this routing?

Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Times for Shenzhen to Genoa
email_chain.body:
Hello Jane,

Thanks for your email. Genoa is our best route at this time. Shipping will take 28 days to Genoa. However, it is possible to bring the goods to our office and store in our warehouse. You may wish to consider this alternative. The shipping cost for this routing is $195. Please let us know if you have any questions.

Regards,
Rebecca

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Times for Shenzhen to Genoa

Thanks for the information. Could you advise if the $195 payment can be made over the phone?

Rebecca

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Times for Shenzhen to Genoa
email_chain.body:

Thanks for your call. You are welcome to leave the product at our office for 28 days to be sent to Genoa. That would be a $195 cost.

Regards,

email_chain.body: Hello Sir, We are sourcing 8,000MT of crude palm oil from Houston to Valencia. We need your capacity for this cargo, please. Best regards, Nathan

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Capacity Inquiry for 8,000MT of Crude Palm Oil
email_chain.body: I got your email. Let me know the quantity and quality you want to buy from us. Regards, Mr. Andy

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Capacity Inquiry for 8,000MT of Crude Palm Oil
email_chain.body: Sir, We have received your email, and the last batch arrived this afternoon. As per our discussion, the quantity we shipped is 3,500MT, and the total FOB is US$10,000,000. Therefore, the FOB value is US$3,000 per ton. Kindly arrange your forwarder; we will be ready to send your samples to you within the next two weeks, and the full payment should be complete within 15 days after the shipment has arrived in your country. Regards, Nathan.

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Capacity Inquiry for 8,000MT of Crude Palm Oil
email_chain.body: Mr. Nathan, Thank you for your email. You said the quantity is 3,500MT, and it costs US$3,000 per ton. I am interested. Can you send me your product samples? I would like to get more information about your product quality. Let me know the next process steps. Yours sincerely, Mr. Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Capacity Inquiry for 8,000MT of Crude Palm Oil
email_chain.body: I am interested, and we are very flexible. It depends on the quantity you want to buy from us. We can supply 8,000MT of CPO to you from here in Houston. We can also assist you with transport. Your budget for this transaction is at least US$24,000. If you can give us proof, we will work together with you to make a profitable transaction. You can also confirm the documentation. For us to proceed with this transaction, we need a...

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Capacity Inquiry for 8,000MT of Crude Palm Oil
email_chain.body: Mr. Tom, Thank you for your email. I think your offer is reasonable. But I think you can send me more information about your company and our transaction. For example, some product pictures and your reference certificate. Then I can confirm if I want to send you my product pictures and my product specifications. Kind regards, Nathan.

email_chain.subject: Freight Rate Inquiry for Diesel Shipment

email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Request for Account Opening
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

I'm looking to arrange an opening of an account with your company, because I think we can work together in the future. Can you send me the details?

Thanks,
Fari

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Shipping Varnishes from St. Louis to New Orleans
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Wood, We have 300MT of varnishes to ship from the port of St. Louis to New Orleans, and I'm waiting on your spot rate. Are you also handling documentation? Thank you, Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Shipping Varnishes from St. Louis to New Orleans
email_chain.body: Dear Maria, Unfortunately, I do not ship varnishes to the New Orleans area. However, if I find anything suited to your needs in my available inventory, I will contact you immediately. If it's another product you are shipping, I'd be more than happy to assist you. I can handle the documentation and arrange for the import. Let me know if you have any questions. Have a great day. Emma

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Shipping Varnishes from St. Louis to New Orleans
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Wood, Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate the information about your inventory. Unfortunately, it does not meet my shipment's needs. If I were to contact you about something different, would that be a problem? As a consultant in the logistics industry, my services are always free of charge and there is no obligation to purchase through my companies. I have contacted a gentleman in New York who could help me get the varnishes to Louisiana if needed. I'd like to give you a call sometime next week to review my rates so you know how I can assist you with your shipments. I really want to help. Thank you, Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Shipping Varnishes from St. Louis to New Orleans
email_chain.body: Hi Maria, Thanks for the call and the offer to help. It is always a good idea to learn from the competition and see if there are ways to improve. However, with someone giving a 'free quote' on a project, there is no commitment to us, which means they have to do whatever they have to do to get that deal. I'm sure they're better than Hotwire, but they will lose you and then we have to deal with you again. That's why I'm so hesitant to send quotes to people I don't know. I do hope we'll keep in touch and maybe, sometime, we'll see if I can't help you on a project. Best regards, Emma

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Shipping Varnishes from St. Louis to New Orleans
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Wood, I was sorry to hear you are not interested in helping me, but if you are interested in consulting me about any way to improve my shipping cost, I am always open to any ideas. I would appreciate if we could at least start off with a friendly email. Thank you and have a good day. Maria

email_chain.subject: Shipment of Zinc Sulfate from Ronessie to Cartagena
email_chain.body:
Hi Colleen,

We need to ship 1,200MT of zinc sulfate from Ronessie to Cartagena. Would you be able to get it done by the end of the month?

This is what you need to know about the client's requirements:
1. You send the cargo from Ronessie to Cartagena.
2. We will ship the payment to the local bank in Cartagena for clearing.
3. Your local bank will send the payment to the carrier to pay for the cargo.
4. The cargo will be delivered to the client in Cartagena.

It would be good if you can help with the customs clearance in Cartagena.

Best regards,
Simon Shyba

Simon Shyba

Quantity: 29,000MT
Origin/ Port of Loading: Bangkok, Thailand

email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Winkler,

I am copying my colleagues, Mr. W. and Mrs. P.

Our customer has a 20,000MT shipment of highly corrosive chemicals from Shanghai to Rotterdam. It’s going to arrive next Friday. We have arranged the freight and are awaiting your cargo agency confirmation.

You have 15 minutes before our customer calls you.

Thanks,
Jacinta

email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Winkler,

I have your tender on file. Thank you for taking the time to review and provide us with your proposal. If there are no further revisions, please advise me with your acceptance.

We look forward to working with you.

Best regards,
Jacinta

email_chain.subject: Re: Corrosive Chemical Shipments from Shanghai to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Jacinta,

Thank you for your offer. I will now confirm that we will accept your services and close this email by acknowledging your work. This should give your colleagues the opportunity to meet you.

I'm sorry to take so long to get back to you; we just finished the examination of the charter.

From our point of view, it would be ideal if the ship could be ready for loading next Friday.

We have provided you with a freight bill copy that is to be sent as soon as the sales invoice has been approved. The final freight bill is due by March 30th.

Once the arrival is confirmed, the terminal must be informed of the shipment so that the unloading can be coordinated. I will forward the relevant documents to you.

Best regards,
Mary Winkler

email_chain.subject: Analysis of Email Chain
email_chain.body:
You may see that the language in Email 3 is totally different compared to Email 1 and 2. How do we know that they are from the same shipper and that the shipper is looking for our services?
Email 3 contains the same piece of information as in Email 1, but with different sentence structure (i.e., punctuation, verb structure). Email 3 contains the same piece of information as in Email 2, but the shipper is going from Rotterdam to Qingdao in Zhejiang. We therefore know that the shipper is the same company, as they are interested in the same commodities. However, some stakeholders in the industry believed the language is not the same. This is because each company, even the same company, has a different style and tone when they email their clients or vendors.
Did you agree with the previous conclusion?
Yes, it is clear that Email 3 contains the same piece of information as in Email 1 and 2.

email_chain.subject: Urgent Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,
Our company has an urgent business deal with a car dealer in the EU. We need to send a consignment from Europe to Chinese Mainland. Therefore, we are looking for a reliable shipper to offer us a freight quote.
Thank you very much in advance.
-Reginald Jones

email_chain.subject: Analysis of Email 4
email_chain.body:
Email 4 contains the same piece of information as in Email 1. However, it is different from Email 2 because Email 2 is a response from a shipper, and Email 4 is a request from a shipper. Based on your judgment, can you see any mistakes in Email 4?
There is a request to forward Email 4 to a shipper, yet this has no mention of the company name. A shipper cannot be contacted without giving the shipper’s full name and contact details. This is a violation.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Free on Board (FOB) Carrier for Shipping a Pallet of Household Items

Thank you very much.
Dr. H, M.D.

email_chain.subject: Analysis of Email 5
email_chain.body:
Email 5 contains a piece of information similar to Email 1 and 2, yet Email 5 is a request from a shipper to a carrier. It may look like Email 4, but you can see that Email 4 is asking for a shipping quotation. Therefore, it is another piece of evidence that confirms the difference between the two types of emails.
Did you agree with the previous conclusion?
Yes, it is clear that Email 4 contains the same piece of information as in Email 1 and 2.

email_chain.subject: Pipeline Construction and Trade Diversion
email_chain.body:
Hey,

Congratulations on winning the contract! I hear you are going to start construction of the pipeline by the end of the month.

My friend in the Ministry of Energy suggested that we create a technical trade diversion scheme to bypass the Russian pipeline monopoly. I'm going to prepare a document to give to you. Please let me know when you have time to meet.

Thanks and best wishes,
Rashid

email_chain.subject: Re: Pipeline Construction and Trade Diversion
email_chain.body:
Hey Rashid,

I just heard about your friend in the Ministry. I find it hard to believe he suggested a plan like that. His intention could be only one thing: to profit from the technical route. I don't want to wait until we sign the contract. You don't want to work with him. Please just sign it, and I will discuss the proposal with him.

Thanks and best,
Mr. Moutran

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Shipment Proposal
email_chain.body:
Hey Rashid,

You have got me pumped up! So now we have to see if it's doable to ship 30,000MT of crude oil from Shah Deniz to Rotterdam by June 16. Stay tuned!

Yours,
Mr. Moutran

email_chain.subject: Technical Route Benefits
email_chain.body:
Hey Rashid,

Let me know your feedback on my suggestion regarding the technical route. Here are the benefits to my company:

- By way of the technical route, it will be possible to increase profits by up to 200m USD.
- The new route will be built for 1.2b USD, this is just an estimate I got from a professional engineer.
- By buying some equipment of equivalent quality, we can save up to 200m USD.
- A small part of this money can be saved by buying cheaper cement.
- In my opinion, the highest potential for savings is in buying high-quality cement with 3% sulfur, as in Azerbaijan.

Thanks,
Rashid

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry for Rice from Hong Kong to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi there,

I’m shipping 1,300MT of rice from Hong Kong to Qingdao. I could be flexible on the ETA, but you would need to deliver by January 10th. What’s your idea?

Thanks,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Rice from Hong Kong to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Thanks for your email.

My reply is below.

Sincerely,
Nick

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Rice from Hong Kong to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

I believe that you are seeking an intermediate shipping line to carry your cargo. It seems like you want to get the rice as soon as possible, but I’m not sure that this is the case.

There are many routes that you can take, but here are the most important factors that will determine the right shipping line for you. The length of time from departure to arrival is important because you need to know when the ship will arrive in Qingdao. It’s important to know if the ship is going to arrive in a timely fashion, or if it will be delayed due to weather conditions or other unexpected events. The longer it takes for the ship to arrive, the more money you will have to pay to cover any delays that might occur.

Sincerely,
Nick

email_chain.body:

I am writing to ask if you are able to schedule an appointment with Mr. James Ding for me?

- Claire A. Norton

email_chain.subject: Appointment Request with Mr. James Ding
email_chain.body:
Hi there,

I am looking for an appointment with Mr. James Ding for today, Saturday.

- Claire A. Norton

email_chain.subject: Shipment Request and Bunker Surcharge Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hey Ms. García,

Could you handle 4,000 MT of wood pulp from Vlissingen to Qingdao? And do you foresee any additional bunker surcharges in the current market?

Best wishes,
Cindy

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Request and Bunker Surcharge Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Cindy,

We received your email inquiring about our availability for the shipment from Vlissingen to Qingdao and additional bunker surcharges.

First, we apologize for the delay in responding. We have contacted our offices in China, and they are ready to discuss the transportation of your shipment immediately. We have not heard anything about additional bunker surcharges for your transportation, but if you let us know the expected arrival date of your shipment, we can advise you further.

If you have any other questions, please let us know.

Thank you for your patience, and we hope to be in contact with you soon.

Kind regards,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Invitation to Join AIP
email_chain.body:
Hey Susanne,

Would you like to join the AIP, which will give you the opportunity to use more ferries and save money?

What are your thoughts?

Thanks,
Beth

email_chain.subject: Request for Standard Cargo Service - Premium Rate - Advance Information
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Houston,

Please refer to my request about the "Standard Cargo Service - Premium Rate - Advance Information".

Best regards,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for 50,000MT CPO Shipment
email_chain.body:
We require a 50,000MT container load of CPO (Codex). We’d like to load it from Houston to Veracruz (WVSC). In case you don’t have the cargo, do you know anyone else who can load it?

Kind regards,
Jeremy

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for 50,000MT CPO Shipment
email_chain.body:
We will forward this inquiry to a few potential suppliers on your behalf. Please allow up to two weeks for the supplier to respond.

Regards,
Marketing Team

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Base Oil Shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Moynihan,

I was wondering if you had the capacity to move 8,000MT of base oil from Rotterdam to Singapore? We have a laycan of April 5th and are looking to make this commitment.

Thank you,
Wendi

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Base Oil Shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Moynihan,

I hope this email finds you well.

I am still in need of the 8,000MT of base oil from Rotterdam to Singapore. The laycan is April 5th. We had to change the place of trade for the tanki, so it is now Europe > Asia.

I have attached my latest tanki. It has all the instructions and details in it. I will email you a pdf copy of the contract.

The contract expires on March 31st at 3pm Singapore time. If you are interested, I would like to negotiate an extension with you. The expiry date is not a hard deadline and it will take time for all parties to receive everything they need from one another, so extending the deadline will hopefully make things easier on all parties.

Thank you,
Wendi

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-Up on Base Oil Shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Wendi,

What do you mean by "Europe > Asia"? I already knew that your contract was to change, since I received your email #1. I would need to see this new contract before I can be confident with our understanding of the deal. I am not willing to move the base oil without seeing this new contract, which is fine.

However, I do not understand what you mean by "Europe > Asia". We are in two different continents, and therefore moving the base oil between Europe and Asia is really impossible to execute. For example, from where in Europe would you like us to load the base oil in? Could we instead export the base oil to either the US or Canada, and then import it to Singapore? Also, the laycan of April 5th is a very tight timeline, and we are unable to make this commitment without seeing your new

Thank you,
Mr. Moynihan

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-Up on Base Oil Shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Wendi,

How do we move 8,000MT of base oil from Rotterdam to Singapore, given that Europe and Asia are different continents? Could we instead export the base oil to either the US or Canada, and then import it to Singapore? This would save you the trouble of negotiating a new contract with a different buyer. Just to clarify, we will be shipping the base oil from the port of Rotterdam to the port of Montreal or Vancouver, depending on which one you choose. Would you still be interested in this alternative?

Thank you,
Mr. Moynihan

email_chain.subject: LNG Cargo Transportation Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Felton,

Can your vessel hold a 12,500MT cargo of LNG from Rotterdam to Singapore? Are you able to let us know the fuel surcharge per day, and what’s your laycan?

Cheers,
Calvin

email_chain.subject: Re: LNG Cargo Transportation Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Greetings Mr. Felton,

I hope this email finds you well.

We just received your proposal for our LNG requirement. I was wondering if there is anything that we can do to improve our request and improve your availability? We do not require emergency availability for this contract, and our expected cargo start date is the 4th of September.

Please let us know if there is any other information that we can provide.

Thank you,
Client’s Name
Client’s Company

email_chain.subject: Request for LPG Cargo Transportation
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Chang,

I’m requesting a cargo of LPG to be transported from Jebel Ali to Pusan. Could you take 1,900 MT for an early-November laycan?

Regards,
Richard

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for LPG Cargo Transportation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Chang,

Thanks for your reply. Unfortunately, we are not able to accept a carriage period later than 17th November.
Could you provide a monthly rate so we can check with management?

Regards,
Richard

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for LPG Cargo Transportation
email_chain.body:
Mr. Chang,

Thank you for your email and I am pleased to inform you that we will be happy to accept your offer at $150,000 per month for a laycan of 17th November. Would you be able to provide the terms and conditions please.

Best Regards,
Scott

email_chain.subject: Shipping Quote Request for Vegetable Oil
email_chain.body:
Hi Lauren,

Could you please provide an offer to ship 2,000,000L of vegetable oil from Chicago to Los Angeles? I was hoping to have this to submit by the end of the week.

Thanks for your assistance,
Jack

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Quote Request for Vegetable Oil
email_chain.body:
Hello Jack,

I am writing to follow up on our phone call the other day. I have sent you an email with an offer to ship 2,000,000L of vegetable oil from Chicago to Los Angeles. I will be working on putting together the same offer for your east coast ports.

My team and I will try our best to ensure that you get the shipment you need. Please let us know if you have any questions.

We look forward to hearing from you,
Lauren

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Vegetable Oil Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Jack,

I’m not sure if you are still looking for a quote to ship 2 million L of vegetable oil from Chicago to LA. The rate we originally quoted you still stands. Please let us know if you’d like to move forward with this, or if you have any questions.

Thank you,
Lauren

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-Up on Vegetable Oil Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Lauren,

The customer has decided to stick with our current partner. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Thanks,
Jack

email_chain.subject: Future Shipping Offer
email_chain.body:
Jack,

Please send me another offer when you get the same rate. The rate we originally quoted you still stands. Please let us know if you’d like to move forward with this, or if you have any questions.

Thank you,
Lauren

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Quote for Vegetable Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Nate,

I’m writing to follow-up on your quote from yesterday. We’re looking at loading 3,600MT of vegetables from Bangladesh to Malaysia. What do you think about my counter-offer of $60/MT DAP?

Regards,
Anneli

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on Quote for Vegetable Shipment
email_chain.body:
Thanks Anneli,

I think you can sell the vegetables at this rate. It’s been an average couple of months for the coffee beans and dairy products, but we should get you a 10% rate increase for those. You may want to increase your seasonal rate for oranges, though, since the fruit is looking unusually good this year. The offer is yours. I’ll be in touch with you about this payment by the end of the week.

Sincerely,
Nate

email_chain.subject: Request Submission and Future Partnership
email_chain.body:
Thanks Anneli,

I appreciate your feedback. I have submitted the request to our systems for approval. I’m sorry to hear about your upcoming sale. I’m hoping we can be a better partner for your business in the future.

Sincerely,
Nate

email_chain.subject: Re: Request Submission and Future Partnership
email_chain.body:
Thanks Nate,

I really appreciate your feedback. It’s been a rough couple of months for the company and our operations have been hit hard by inflation. I’m hoping we can still work together in the future and be a reliable source for your clients.

Sincerely,
Anneli

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Steel Coil Transportation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Porter, 

We’re interested in moving some steel coil from Guangzhou to Nantong. Could you give us an idea of what your freight rate will be, and whether you would be able to move it in time to make our deadlines?

Thanks,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Steel Coil Transportation
email_chain.body:
Hi Chris,

Thank you for contacting me. As you’re aware, we do transport steel coils, but we have the service down to only a few weekly trips. I will put in a request to see if I can make the next available route to cover your needs.

If you can hold a few weeks for our service, it will be the most economical. I have included some of our general pricing for similar services so you can understand the value of our services.

I would highly recommend loading the cargo with the opening side up for more protection from the elements. You can do this with one person as shown in the video.

Please feel free to contact me if you have any further questions.

Regards,
Jessica

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Steel Coil Transportation
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your reply. We would be very grateful if you could cover this run. We’re on very tight deadlines and need the product to make the end of February. Our shipping company has been slow.

Can you also confirm the price you are charging, per ton of cargo?

Many thanks,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Steel Coil Transportation
email_chain.body:
Hello Chris,

I’m working with our booking agents to secure the necessary booking for your cargo. As I mentioned previously, our route operates once a week, but due to a change in our routing, I have confirmed that we can add this item onto our next available run. The vessel will be on route to China on the 24th of this month and will have this cargo on the ship.

I’m still waiting on a rate quote from our container freight forwarder. I will let you know when I have the information.

Best regards,
Jessica

email_chain.subject: Price Quotation for Diesel Order
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Kitonga,

We have a sample order for the sale of 5MT of diesel from Dar es Salaam. Is it possible to receive a price?

Regards,
Jessica Buckle

email_chain.subject: Procedure for Ordering Diesel
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Kitonga,

I have been given the task of placing an order for diesel for the organization. What is the standard procedure for ordering the fuel? Can I expect a price quotation from your company?

Regards,
Jessica Buckle

email_chain.subject: Re: Procedure for Ordering Diesel
email_chain.body:
Dear Jessica Buckle,

Thank you for your email regarding the purchase of diesel for the company. I've received some information about the purchase process.

You should go to the company's main office to purchase the fuel. The office is located at 14 - 17, Nairobi Street, Kampala. When you reach the office, you should request to see the office manager and then provide the following information about your order:
- The quantity of the fuel
- The type of the fuel
- The location from where the fuel will be delivered
- The date on which the order is needed

Thank you for your cooperation.

Sincerely,
Mr. Kitonga

email_chain.subject: Charter Request for Liquid Chemicals from Oujda to Algeciras
email_chain.body:
Hello Gianluca,

Can you handle 8,000MT of liquid chemicals from Oujda to Algeciras? If so, could you please contact our representatives in Madrid and quickly get the details signed up for the charter party?

Many thanks,
Sabeel

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Vessel Confirmation Required
email_chain.body:
Dear Gianluca,

We need to transport 8,000MT of liquid chemicals from Oujda to Algeciras. The shipment details are as follows:

- Arrival: 14 August 2021
- Departure: 27 August 2021
- Packaging: Not specified
- Bank: 12.5% requested

Please indicate ASAP which vessel you would be able to take our cargo. This is very important to us as we have 30 days from today (15/6) to sign up a vessel. If you are unavailable to meet our timelines, please let us know ASAP so we can start looking elsewhere.

Thank you,
Sabeel

email_chain.subject: Invoice and Charter Details
email_chain.body:
Hello Gianluca,

Here is the invoice for our tonnage of 8,000MT. We are ready to charter it as soon as possible. The details are as follows:

1) The route from Oujda to Algeciras and back with arrival on 14/8 and 27/8
2) Any of the ships listed on the website which you believe is able to load and unload on 15/8 and 26/8
3) Cargo: 8,000MT
4) Arrival time: 15/8/2021 for loading in Oujda
5) Delivery time: 26/8/2021 in Algeciras
6) Packaging: steel canisters, dimensions to be confirmed
7) Bank: requested 12.5% C&B, due before shipping

Our agents in Madrid can complete the contract within 30 days.

Many thanks,
Sabeel

email_chain.subject: Cargo Details Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Gianluca,

We are currently looking to confirm the following cargo details:

1) Amount of cargo: 8,000MT
2) Dimensions: 12 m x 20 m x 15 m
3) Steel containers
4) Loading start date: 8 August 2021
5) Delivery date: 28 August 2021

We also need to know if you can carry this cargo. Please let us know if you are not able to offer this service. We are ready to sign up a vessel as soon as possible. To do this, we need to know the details of the vessel to confirm the details.

Many thanks,
Sabeel

email_chain.subject: Request for Flour Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Ms. Olafson,

Could you ship 2,000MT of flour from Charleroi to Jerez for this week? How much would you charge for reefer plug?

Regards,
Lars

email_chain.subject: Freight and Terms Proposal
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Rolando,

We have received your order and here is the freight and terms we propose, do you accept? We are holding the cargo until the offer is accepted.

Regards,
Lars

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight and Terms Proposal
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Salas,

The offer that you proposed for our shipment of 2,000MT flour is greatly appreciated, and we will send the confirmation to the above email.

Regards,
Lars

email_chain.subject: Payment Terms
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Lars,

Thank you for the confirmation, and here are the payment terms:
FOB Charleroi, BE
Payment upon delivery with term n3.
Bank transfer
Freight and insurance to be paid in full and collect from port of shipment

Regards,
Rolando

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Rolando,

Please confirm your offer for the 2,000MT flour shipment from Charleroi to Jerez. Do you have any questions regarding the payment terms? We are holding the order until the offer is confirmed.

Regards,
Lars

email_chain.subject: Re: Payment Terms
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your confirmation, we will prepare the bill of lading and send it to you in the next hours. Please advise us of the time needed to do the bank transfer.

Regards,
Rolando

email_chain.subject: Bill of Lading
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Rolando,

Thank you for your confirmation. We have provided you with the bill of lading, please let us know if you would like us to send the bill of lading by email or via fax.

Regards,
Lars

email_chain.subject: Payment Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Rolando,

Thank you for your confirmation. We have received the payment for the 2,000MT flour shipment from Charleroi to Jerez. We have now updated your invoice, and sent it to you by email for your convenience.

Regards,
Lars

email_chain.subject: Re: Bill of Lading
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Rolando,

Thank you for your confirmation. We have prepared the bill of lading and sent it to you via email, please let us know if you would like us to send it by fax as well.

Regards,
Rolando

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Charter to China
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Xiao,

I'm currently looking for a charter to deliver 6,000MT of steel to China. Do you have any new openings to China and can you send me the cost?

Regards,
Stefano

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Charter to China
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Xiao,

Do you have any new openings to China? If yes, I would like to hear from you as soon as possible.

Regards,
Stefano

email_chain.subject: Company and Product Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Xiao,

Thanks for your email of <date>.

I am sending you the details of my company and products. Hopefully, you will find something of interest to you. If not, no worries, and I look forward to hearing from you.

Kind regards,
Stefano

email_chain.subject: Company and Product Details (Resend)
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Xiao,

Thanks for your email of <date>.

I am sending you the details of my company and products. Hopefully, you will find something of interest to you. If not, no worries, and I look forward to hearing from you.

Kind regards,
Stefano

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Charter to China
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Xiao,

Do you have any new openings to China and can you send me the cost?

Regards,
Stefano

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Polypropylene Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Frank,

I’ve just been forwarded your inquiry for 3,200MT of polypropylene for discharge in Harare. Could you confirm if your minimums can accept a long laycan? I’m also wondering if you can bear the high cost for next month, since your price is competitive.

Sincerely,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Polypropylene Shipment
email_chain.body:
Tom,

Thank you for your inquiry. I am interested in stocking 3,200 MT at your port. I hope we can reach an agreement on this offer. I can bear the cost for the next month.

Best Regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed for Polypropylene Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Tom,

I have some questions to clarify before I can close the deal with you for the above offer:
1. When do you expect the order to be completed?
2. How much will the shipment cost?
3. Can you confirm that this shipment will be 100% polypropylene and that there will be no other types of goods?

Please reply to this email.

Best Regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification Needed for Polypropylene Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Frank,

Can you please reply ASAP? I would like to know if you will send polypropylene or any other material, or if you will cancel the shipment due to the low volume of the offer.

Please clarify what you will be sending.

Thank you for your reply.

Sincerely,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Urgent Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Jean-Paul,

I have an urgent 3,600MT cargo of sodium hydroxide from Hueneme to Xiamen. Could you give me your earliest load date?

Best regards,
Marc

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body:
Thanks for your mail. Yes, our capacity is 15KMT at the end of February, and the timing is within your schedule. We'll contact you in a few days if this is not the case.

Best regards,
Jean-Paul

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body:
Thanks for your reply. At present, there is no available space from BCP to USA, so I will cancel this shipment. We will be in touch for the next openings.

Best regards,
Marc

email_chain.subject: Cargo Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Thanks for confirming.

Is there any chance to receive 3000MT cargo of Dried Mangoes from Norwalk, CA 4W11 to Chongqing around the middle of August? Let me know in advance the earliest loading date so I can confirm.

Best regards,
Marc

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Thanks for your mail. At this moment, we do not have any containers available for these destinations in our loading schedule. If you have a sudden demand, please feel free to contact me.

Best regards,
Jean-Paul

email_chain.subject: Shipment of Steel Billets from China to Istanbul
email_chain.body: I’m currently booking a shipment of steel billets from China to Istanbul, and I have the offer from <COMPANY NAME> enclosed. Are you able to pick this up? If so, could you give me your port charge estimate, and let me know your preferred arrival date? Thank you, Sam

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment of Steel Billets from China to Istanbul
email_chain.body: Thank you for your email. I’ve passed your request on to the port of loading, but I have not received a response yet. Please give me some more time to contact the supplier again.

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment of Steel Billets from China to Istanbul
email_chain.body: Thank you for your reply. Your request has been passed on to the port of loading. I was just wondering if there is any way you could tell me your preferred arrival date? I’d be very grateful if you could let me know. Thanks again.

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment of Steel Billets from China to Istanbul
email_chain.body: I’m sorry for the delay. Our port of loading has been unable to confirm any ports until early next week. Could you please give me a call back? Thanks!

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment of Steel Billets from China to Istanbul
email_chain.body: Thank you for your call. I was just wondering when you would be able to get back to me? If possible, could you please give me your preferred arrival date? I would be very grateful. Thank you.

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment of Steel Billets from China to Istanbul
email_chain.body: Thank you for your reply. We are currently looking into port costs and estimated arrival dates, and I will get back to you when I have more information. Please let me know if there are any other questions you have. Thank you very much for your time. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

email_chain.subject: Cargo Shipping Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Morrow,

Thank you for your prompt response. We’re planning a 3,200MT cargo of natural gas from Casablanca to Lisbon. Can you confirm if your vessel can handle a mid-April laycan, and at what cost?

Sincerely,
Ishaan

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Shipping Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Ishaan,

Thank you for your inquiry. Our vessel can indeed handle a mid-April laycan. The cost for our services is as follows:
- $100,000 on account.
- $50,000 at delivery.

The laycan would be for arrival on May 5th in Lisbon. Please note that this cost is our exclusive offer, as you have requested the expedition in the shortest time frame possible. To accept the deal, kindly let us know via email within 24 hours.

Yours truly,
Noah

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Shipping Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Noah,

Thank you for your kind offer, however, I’m afraid we’ll have to decline. We’re currently looking at shipping our cargo via a shorter, more cost-efficient route. However, if you can wait and offer a lower rate, we might reconsider. Kindly confirm your rate and laycan within 24 hours.

Sincerely,
Ishaan

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Shipping Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Ishaan,

Thank you for your response. Unfortunately, I’ll have to decline your offer. I’d prefer to ship my cargo via a shorter route to keep costs down. If you can wait a bit longer and offer a lower rate, I might reconsider. Kindly confirm your rate and laycan within 24 hours.

Yours truly,
Noah

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Shipping Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Noah,

We’ll take your offer of a lower rate. As per our conversation, our deal would be:
- $75,000 on account.
- $50,000 at delivery.

The laycan would be for arrival on May 5th in Lisbon. Please note that this cost is our exclusive offer, as you requested the expedition in the shortest time frame possible. To accept the deal, kindly let us know via email within 24 hours.

Yours truly,
Ishaan

email_chain.subject: Request for Mango Juice Shipment from Maasai Mara to Lomé
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Sringeri,

We are looking to move 5000MT of mango juice from Maasai Mara to Lomé. We'd like to book this shipment immediately but need your confirmation on whether you accept the freight on this shipment (1200 USD, port to port).

Please let me know if you're available or if you want to discuss this further over the phone.

Warmly,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Mango Juice Shipment from Maasai Mara to Lomé
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

I accept your offer. Could you please provide the following details? Port of Origin and destination Port? GIN Code? All this information is available at our website http://www.africanshipping.net if you have any questions.

Warmly,
Mukesh

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Mango Juice Shipment from Maasai Mara to Lomé
email_chain.body:
Dear Mukesh,

I have emailed you the required information. I also have a few additional questions that I hope you can assist with:
1. What is your Port of Load?
2. What is the appropriate GIN Code for this shipment?
3. How long will it take for the shipment to arrive in Lomé?
4. Is this an express shipment?
5. How much is the shipment value?
6. When should we expect the shipment to arrive?
7. Does the shipment come with insurance?

Please confirm receipt of these items and respond with a yes or no answer to each question.

Warmly,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Cyclohexanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Nora,

Did you come across a set of tankers from Maracaibo to Klaipeda with a request for 1,900MT of cyclohexanol for the last week of August? Would you be able to reach out to the carrier to find out how we can proceed?

Sincerely,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Cyclohexanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
As promised, I have reached out to the sender with the request that you make contact with him.

Feel free to get in touch with me should you have any questions about this shipment.

Thank you.
Sara

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Cyclohexanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I do not have any open, ongoing projects with this customer. Please forward my request to the sender of this email to cancel this request.

I have forwarded your request to the designated agent.

Thank you for your assistance.
Sara

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Cyclohexanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello James,

This shipment was canceled yesterday, but I just wanted to remind you of our discussion about trying to move other customers’ products at the last minute. I believe you know I can guarantee to move the product for them, and you can do so in exchange for a small percentage.

Could you let me know if that’s a possibility? I’ll be on vacation until the end of the month, so it may be a little while before you get back to me.

Please reply to this email if you can. I really need to get this cleared up before my departure.

Sincerely,
Sara

email_chain.subject: First Attempt at Writing Professional Emails
email_chain.body:
Hi Matthieu,

This is my first attempt at writing professional emails. If I can get this right, it will be easier next time. I need your help to improve.

Thanks,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Re: First Attempt at Writing Professional Emails
email_chain.body:
Hey Matthieu,

Just sent you an email. Don't rush! It's just practice. Remember to send out the month 1 write-ups too!

Best,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Feedback on Your Emails
email_chain.body:
Hi Alice,

I just received your first email. We are only in week 2, but the writing could be improved. It's a shame because we've invested a lot of time forming a group and planning. Writing professionally is crucial. Your first email doesn't sound very professional. I understand you were in a hurry, but here are some tips to improve your writing and save time in the future.

Keep it up!
Matthieu

email_chain.subject: Re: Feedback on Your Emails
email_chain.body:
Hi Matthieu,

I'm a bit overwhelmed. I tried writing as many emails as possible because of your help. Thanks for this.

Could you check emails 3 and 4?

Thanks,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Re: Feedback on Your Emails
email_chain.body:
Hi Alice,

Email 3 is much better. Here is another email, email 4. It's quite long, but I did my best to correct all the mistakes.

I'm aware that we have already lost some time in the past weeks. I'm really sorry about that. I didn't think my writing would turn out so bad. I don't know if you want me to continue with the writing, but I think I'm learning more from it. I like to think of writing as a skill that can be acquired. There's no use just waiting for me to get it right. I really enjoy your emails and appreciate your feedback.

Is it alright if I write the next email and just copy-paste everything from my mentor email to save time? That's what I'm planning to do.

By the way, if there is something you want me to

Best,
Matthieu

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote: Shipping Liquid Calcium Chloride

I need to ship 10,300MT of liquid calcium chloride from Rotterdam to San Diego, USA. Could you provide the most reliable quote as soon as possible?

Looking forward to your reply,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote: Shipping Liquid Calcium Chloride
email_chain.body:
Michael,

Thank you for your interest. We have a good price for this chemical. Please contact me by phone for details.

Best regards,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quotation
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

Thank you for the information. We are interested in it. Please send us the shipping quotation for this material, including transportation and insurance. Also, please send us your shipping terms.

Regards,
Eric

email_chain.subject: Business Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

Hello,

I want to tell you about my business. We are interested in chemicals, so please let me know what chemicals you have. I am ready to give you our offer. Thanks.

With Regards,
Jonathan

email_chain.subject: Re: Business Inquiry

Thanks for your feedback. It was very kind of you to say that.

Best regards,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Bitumen Shipments
email_chain.body: Thank you for your recent inquiries on bitumen shipments. I will work on this inquiry and get back to you by next week. Regards, Rina

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Bitumen Shipments
email_chain.body: Greetings! I had the pleasure of meeting you last week and inquiring about bitumen shipments. I trust you are well and I look forward to your reply. Should you require any additional information about our services, please feel free to contact me. Kind regards, Rina

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Bitumen Shipments
email_chain.body: I started working on this email in Outlook 2016 and when it was done I went to Outlook Web Access and published it to my email account. I went back to my computer and the email wasn't finished yet. How can I edit the email in OWA? Thank you. Sorry for the inconvenience. You can edit this email in OWA. Click the email you want to edit. Click More... > Open the item. This also allows you to check your mail on another device with web browser.

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Inquiry on Bitumen Shipments
email_chain.body: Dear Jeroen, Thank you for your recent inquiries on bitumen shipments. I will work on this inquiry and get back to you by next week. I am forwarding your inquiry to Jeroen. Should you require any additional information about our services, please feel free to contact me. Regards, Rina

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Inquiry on Bitumen Shipments
email_chain.body: Hi Rina, Kindly see below for the updated information. Thanks, Kind regards, Jeroen

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Bitumen Shipments
email_chain.body: Thanks for the email. When you create a new email, you should be able to see the Send button (in Outlook 2016/2013/2010/2007) or the Save button (in Outlook 2003), and have the other options greyed out. If this is not the case, we need to find out why. It looks like email 4 does not have a send button, only save. This means that you cannot send that email. The email should probably be copied over to a separate email in Outlook and sent from there.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Bitumen Shipments
email_chain.body: Sir, Kindly see below for the updated information. Thanks, Regards, Rina

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Bitumen Shipments
email_chain.body: Unfortunately, in your case, email 3 is missing signature 4, and email 2 and 4 are missing signature 1. It's possible that the sender has deleted these emails before they were sent. I can confirm that the emails are not being sent, they were deleted from my mailbox. This is a security measure taken when email 3 was created (not a complete email). Since this is a security measure, there is no way to undo it. However, you can contact me to see if we can send out email 3 using another email address. If we cannot get email 3, we can look into getting email 1. Why is my Outlook item missing my signature? How to attach a file to an email.

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel from Manzanillo to Cadiz
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Castillo,

Our 1,600MT of FWA are currently en route to Manzanillo. I need a vessel to take it to Cadiz. Could you please advise me on the earliest possible laycan and the latest arrival port time into Cadiz?

Thanks,
Roberto

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel from Manzanillo to Cadiz
email_chain.body:
Dear Roberto,

I had a quick look at the AIS schedule but unfortunately, they don't call at Cadiz. I was also trying to find a connection to Cadiz in the London schedule but it's not there either. However, I've just found a possibility via Vigo in Spain. Could you please let me know if you'd be open to a Vigo port call? (This is for your risk management). The AIS calls into Cadiz on 21st August which is out of your risk windows, but the AIS only sails to Vigo on the 20th. We could ship to Vigo and arrange a truck for you to pick it up (1,600MT of FWA, I am assuming?). I can do the paperwork and let you know the terms as well.

Thank you,
Eileen

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Transporting Hydrochloric Acid
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Do you have any openings for transporting 14,000 gallons of hydrochloric acid from Rotterdam to Hamburg? The preferred mode of transport is Barge.
If possible, start as early as May 17, and end no later than May 30th.

Thanks,
Amanda

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Biomass
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Can you please tell me the cost of shipping 100 tons of biomass from Chicago to Rotterdam by rail?

Thanks,
Miles

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Transporting Hydrochloric Acid
email_chain.body:
Hi Amanda,

Here's the gist of the project:
Protein Stabilizer is needed in Rotterdam to be delivered to Amsterdam (Harbor of A) by air as soon as possible. It is urgently needed in a timely fashion as it is to be loaded onto a barge that is also leaving Rotterdam on the 12th of May. It is imperative that it be delivered to the correct location as soon as possible.
A transport company is interested in purchasing the product, but there must be a quick and reliable way of transporting it to the barge so the payment can be made at the time of delivery.
Shipping via air freight is the only way we can guarantee timely delivery, however it will cost approximately $120,000 to ship it to Amsterdam in an FCL pallet. (FCL is Freight Collect on Loading; meaning that a pallet is loaded on a truck and paid for at loading.)

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Transportation of Product
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Barker,

Thank you for your timely reply regarding the transportation of our product. We are extremely interested in transporting the product to the A port in the barge. We would like to request that you complete the job on the 8th May so that we may pay you on that date.
Please let us know if you are willing to complete the transportation of the product on the 8th of May at 9 am.
If the product is delivered to us, we will pay you $13,000 in cash and $3000 in product.

Thank you for your time and we look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Ms. Clark

email_chain.subject: Re: Transportation of Product
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Clark,

We are sorry for the delayed response. We are very sorry, but we are unable to complete the job on the 8th of May.
The cost of the transportation is $5000.

Thank you for your time.

Best regards,
John Barker

Seema Pansuriya
DAILY INTERNATIONAL
Operation Manager
Tel. +91 8200 65666

email_chain.subject: Re: Delay of Bill of Lading
email_chain.body: We are sorry to learn about the latest delay of this bill of lading which we strongly suspected from the beginning. In fact, you will recall that the cargo was in the warehouse of our office at the commencement of the storm. We even had the warehouse and other locations surveyed for water damage and it was found that all goods were safe and no damage was recorded at the time. Moreover, the same people were still there after the storm having kept the place clean and free from the mud and debris generated after the storm. We are not sure of the reason behind your claims of damage as it was not visible. We still feel that it is possible that the stuff might have been damaged by pests since the warehouse was located a few meters away from the sea and the waves coming during the storm would have come and crashed on the sea wall and so there was a possibility of insects having entered the warehouse through the

Tan

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Tonnage Booking and Vessel Capacity
email_chain.body:

Regards,
Rebecca

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Tonnage Booking and Vessel Capacity
email_chain.body:
Dear Rebecca,

Thank you for your email. I’m very happy that you are looking into opening up a new route. I can help you with that and will be more than glad to support you for your container requirements in the future. There is no route problem with ACI. I will call you to discuss the cargo you need and what I can do for you. Do let me know what your closest port is and whether you need TEU or FEU.

Sincerely yours,
Min

Could you give me a few vessels with some ETA information in the next week? My shipper just left Sydney yesterday with the same instructions, and I need some backup. Thanks, Anthony

email_chain.subject: Urgent Request for Shipping 3,000MT of Wheat to Brazil
email_chain.body: Dear Bill, We are urgently looking to ship 3,000 metric tonnes of Australian wheat to Brazil. We would appreciate it if you could get back to us ASAP. Regards, Elena

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry from Shipping Department
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Taylor, John here from our Shipping Department. We are a well-known company that has been in shipping and trading for nearly 15 years. We are available for trading Wheat, Rice, Corn, Soybean, and Sugar. We have received messages from potential buyers (Email 1 and Email 2) who require your help. You can show them our previous transactions. If you are interested, please contact us as soon as possible. If you want, you can also get their contact information and have a conversation with them. We assure strict confidence and reserve rights. We will keep this a secret and give you full compensation for your efforts. If you have not received a reply from them within 24 hours, we will let you know who they are. Regards, John

email_chain.subject: LPG Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body:
