email_chain.body: Finally, I was able to put the email into the virus scanner. I was concerned that it might be one of those items, the ones that you can not detect. Best regards, Dr. Larson

email_chain.subject: Granules Shipment for Vessel Urania
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Lin,

We will be sending 100MT of granules for your vessel Urania. Please advise us if you will be needing a seawater hose on the ballast.

Best regards,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Re: Granules Shipment for Vessel Urania
email_chain.body:
Mr. Lin,

Hello,

Thank you for your email.

As for your proposal, the UCRATIS team has decided to take action in a different direction. To be more specific, we think that at this time, the communication of the tanker Urania to the local authorities is enough to ensure environmental safety. We are willing to share our communication with the nearby towns on this local website: https://www.comportadecreciente.com/comporta.html.

As for the lagoons, the port authority will keep doing their inspections and reporting to the correct authorities. That is not under our scope. If you could kindly refer to the annex, you could find relevant information on what the port authority has to do.

The final assessment of the damages and liability will be the jurisdiction of a tribunal, not the team from the UCRATIS.

We look

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Grounding of Vessel Urania in Escombreras Bay
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lin,

The owner and charterer of the ship Urania have decided to take immediate action and ground the vessel in Escombreras Bay due to the alarm generated by the cargo spill of illegal poaching activities and, more recently, the news of the vessel leaving Malaga port for 8 hours without proper documentation. We would like to ask you to make an agreement to enable us to ground the vessel in Escombreras Bay, in compliance with our charter agreement, which, according to our lawyers, is a non-arbitral agreement. Please let us know how long it will take you to authorize our operation.

Best regards,
Jonathan Hagan

[Image 3] The Owner and Charterer of the ship Urania has sent a message to the port authority requesting permission to ground the ship in Escombreras Bay. They state that the ship has

email_chain.body:
Hello Bob,

Cheers,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Tel-Aviv to Karachi Service

email_chain.body:

As you may know, we had already contracted with your company before when we were doing the Arroyo Valley Bridge cleanup. The rates were very good. And now I also need a little favor from you to get 30,000 pounds of gravel from Balcomino Port to Paraiso Port. I'm attaching the LOI.

Matt

email_chain.subject: Updated Contract for Review
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Simmons,

I have good news for you. Finally, I got the support from the leaders of my country to sign a contract with you. I just want to send you the updated contract. Please check the details and review the rate.

Regards,
Solano

email_chain.subject: Authorized Budget and Contract Signature
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Simmons,

The budget is authorized by the vice president. This is the newest updated contract. As the official, I need your signature first to make sure that everything is accurate.

Best regards,
Geof

email_chain.subject: Review and Sign the Contract
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Simmons,

The documents are uploaded here. Please check them and send your feedback. If you agree with everything, please sign the contract. If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Best regards,
Rainer

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Sign the Contract
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Simmons,

Please make sure to sign the contract as soon as possible. Thank you very much.

Regards,
Dmitriy

email_chain.subject: Question About Deposit Payment
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Simmons,

I just reviewed the rate and it is very reasonable. But there is one problem. The team leader asked me to pay 20% of the price as a deposit. How do I pay the deposit? Can you transfer it to me? If not, can you arrange the rate in such a way that the customer has to pay the deposit as well?

Regards,
Alexander

email_chain.subject: Request for 2,000MT of Tar
email_chain.body:
Mr. Santos,

I’m looking for 2,000MT of tar for a deadline of August 25. Do you see any issues with getting it to Cotonou? I know you only have one lane, but you’re the one I’ve been working with the longest, so I know you can get it done.

Best,
Rachel

PS. If I get back from a vacation on the same day, I can pick it up.
Thank you,
Noah

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for 2,000MT of Tar
email_chain.body:
Noah,

So sorry to hear you might not be able to get back until next week. Can you give me a call, please? I’ve found another terminal that can get us there in 3 days.

Best,
Rachel

PS. Just don’t tell your boss about it. He’ll probably write a whole big deal about it.

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for 2,000MT of Tar
email_chain.body:
Noah,

Glad to hear you’ve got a new connection. Best of luck getting this done. I’ve got you another quote that will get it to your customer next week, and I’ll try to get you 1,000MT this week to make up for it.

Best,
Rachel

PS. Thanks for trying to get me the deal with the CC.

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for 2,000MT of Tar
email_chain.body:
Hi Rachel,

I love the FOB pricing we got today. This is just what I needed to help me make my boss happy.

Best,
Eric

PS. Great job closing that Cotonou deal.

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for 2,000MT of Tar
email_chain.body:
Noah,

Great job on the deal in Cotonou. I got you the 2,000MT and you can send me the $2,000 to pay for it. I’ve got more clients waiting on me. Thanks!

Best,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for 2,000MT of Tar
email_chain.body:
Noah,

Thanks for all your hard work getting this done.

Best,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Dry Bulk Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Brandon,

I am considering your company for a dry bulk cargo shipment of 9,500MT of limestone from South Africa to Indonesia. Please confirm your available space. Can you offer a fixed rate or ship at cost+3% to P&I?

Thank you,
Sam

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry for Dry Bulk Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sam,

You may have received our offer on your proposed voyage as requested. I can confirm that we have availability, but we are offering the space at 19% above our spot rate. Your proposal mentions that you would like a fixed rate. We will take that into consideration when issuing an offer, however, spot rates for this commodity are quite high at the moment. If you would like to go ahead with this voyage, our offer will be valid for 48 hours. Please kindly confirm that you have our proposal.

Thanks,
Nicolas

email_chain.subject: RE: Nicolas sending you proposal
email_chain.body:
Hi guys,

Just a brief reply to your emails. I received your proposed voyage on October 19th, 2022. The offer for a fixed rate is a bit less than your spot rate, but I believe it is a good opportunity to grab your business. Let me know if this fits in with your requirements.

Thanks,
Sam

email_chain.subject: RE: Nicolas asking for a Dry Bulk cargo of 9,500MT of limestone from South Africa to Indonesia
email_chain.body:
Hi Sam,

Thank you for your reply. As mentioned in my previous email, we do have available space and I have quoted the fixed rate based on the current market rate. We are offering at 19% above the spot rate, as mentioned earlier. It may be a good opportunity for us to get your business, but please let me know your requirements.

Thanks,
Nicolas

email_chain.subject: RE: Nicolas asking for a Dry Bulk cargo of 9,500MT of limestone from South Africa to Indonesia
email_chain.body:
Hello Sam,

I have a quick question for you. I have calculated the total cost of shipment and I believe we can offer a fixed rate for the whole trip. The quotation will be 27% above the spot rate. This may be a very high rate for you, but do let me know if it suits your requirement.

Thanks,
Nicolas

email_chain.subject: RE: Nicolas replying to Nicolas
email_chain.body:
Hi Sam and Brandon,

I have sent the final proposal. I have offered a fixed rate of $16,125 per metric ton. I will be waiting to receive your confirmation.

Thanks,
Nicolas

email_chain.subject: RE: Nicolas replying to Nicolas
email_chain.body:
Nicolas,

Yes, we have confirmed the proposal and we accept the offer of $16,125 per metric ton. Your proposal is much lower than our spot rate, but we are willing to go ahead with this voyage. Please confirm your space and the estimated time of loading, departure, and arrival.

Thanks,
Sam

email_chain.subject: RE: Nicolas replying to Nicolas
email_chain.body:
Hi Sam and Brandon,

Thank you for accepting our proposal. I have confirmed your acceptance and we are now proceeding with the loading, departure, and arrival. Our vessel is currently discharging at the port of Durban, South Africa, and we will be loading the limestone on board on the 18th of October. We are expecting to reach the Indonesian port of Tanjung Priok on the 30th of October.

Thanks,
Nicolas

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Chemical Shipment from Kavala to Odessa
email_chain.body:
Good day Ms. Spivakova,

Thank you for your inquiry about fixing a 2,000MT runout of chemical from Kavala to Odessa. I need to know your margin for margin calculation. Can you also quote for groupage charges?

Thank you,
Jonas.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Chemical Shipment from Kavala to Odessa
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your message.

I have calculated the possible shipping costs as follows:
- Full Container Load (FCL): 400 EUR
- Groupage 24 MT: 210 EUR
However, my margin calculation shows that FCL shipping will be the cheapest option. Please let me know if I am missing something.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Chemical Shipment from Kavala to Odessa
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your email.

I have calculated the margin based on a full container load, and the margin for Kavala to Odessa is: 0.4 * 120000 / 12 = 2000 USD. We should be able to offer 400 EUR as a surcharge for any container size, not only a 20ft one. Please check once again and advise.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Chemical Shipment from Kavala to Odessa
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Spivakova,

The margin from the survey is 36%, not 12%. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Jonas

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about MS Irene and Coal Shipping
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Amrita Gomes,

Thank you for getting back to us regarding MS Irene. We are interested in shipping your coal and are looking for the earliest possible loading window.

Could you please let us know your best offer? The charter rate is $33,000/day and the owner’s hire is $4,500/day.

Thanks,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about MS Irene and Coal Shipping
email_chain.body:
Dear Paul,

Kind regards to you and all your staff.

How are you all doing? We are currently loading cargo for IMO 2020 and hope the charter will start in 20 days with your ship. We are loading about 300,000 tons with 1.5% MGO and, of course, you will carry FSO.

We are sailing C2C and will add 500,000 MT of GHT on each way. I have asked for your arrival notice now, so it should be there soon. In that case, we would like to ask you to call me to discuss delivery with the cargo to your yard.

I would like to get in touch with you on a more formal basis as well, so I would be interested in getting your charter partner, manager, or someone with a similar profile. I would appreciate it if you could get back to me.

Best regards,
Lars Petter Berge

email_chain.subject: Delivery of Strawberries from France to Mexico
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Crabtree,

We’ll have a 2,400MT delivery of out-of-season strawberries from France to Mexico next week. We have an early port of loading available for you, and we’re happy to include your preferred on-truck coordination service. The shipment will be running from Rotterdam to Medellin.

Could you please let me know if you have a vessel that would suit our requirements, and your standard waiting charges?

Best,
Sharon

email_chain.subject: Re: Delivery of Strawberries from France to Mexico
email_chain.body:
Hi Sharon,

Thanks for your message. I’ve sent an A-List rate for your service, also provided my wait charges. I have space on the <ship> on the week of <dates>. If you can get a berth, that would be fine.

Please let me know if you can.

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Delivery of Strawberries from France to Mexico
email_chain.body:
Hello Alex,

Thank you for your offer. Unfortunately, we will not be able to send the cargo to Rotterdam by ship. We plan to send our shipment to Dublin, Ireland, via the Rotterdam-Rotterdam route. This is why we will be chartering a vessel.

Best,
Sharon

email_chain.subject: Re: Delivery of Strawberries from France to Mexico
email_chain.body:
Hi Sharon,

Great to hear from you. Please let me know when you will need to complete your paperwork. We are available from Monday, 21 August to Friday, 25 August.

We are 1 to 2 days ahead of schedule this week, and it should take us at most 2 weeks to load.

email_chain.subject: Adrian - Request for Open Slot for Coal Cargo
email_chain.body:

Regards,
Adrian

P.S. Feel free to send a picture of yourself on a boat or with a cup of coffee in hand.

email_chain.subject: Cachorrão - Wood Imports from Brazil to South Africa
email_chain.body:
Olá Neko,

For the past 6 years, I’ve been importing wood to South Africa. The trade has been fantastic. Initially, the Canadians and Australians dominated the market, but now the quantity of wood from Brazilian forests has skyrocketed.

However, we’re facing transportation difficulties. Rio de Janeiro is almost halfway between Salvador and Maputo, and the Panama Canal is currently halted due to rain. Do you have any open slots for importing from Brazil to South Africa?

If there’s space, please check the price for a bill of lading.

Best,
Cachorrão

email_chain.subject: Re: Cachorrão - Wood Imports from Brazil to South Africa
email_chain.body:
Muito obrigado por sua mensagem, Cachorrão.

I’m glad to hear you’re dealing with wood! I mainly handle grains and ships with my friends from Zimbabwe and Rwanda. We don’t have issues transporting grains as long as the Atlantic Ocean channels are open.

We’ve made a small route in Zimbabwe and have a unique opening in Rwanda. I wanted to extend the route to South Africa but am wary of the Panama Canal’s situation, which was quite bad in 2019/2020.

We’ve safely crossed the Atlantic. I have a crew member who can assist with the navigation.

Best,
Neko

email_chain.subject: Commodity Trading Update
email_chain.body:
Hello Neko,

I’m from Mozambique. In the past, I bought bulk grains to Angola from Zambia, but now I only sell dry bulk fertilizer, hard fertilizers, soft fertilizers, and rocks.

I also imported 4×4 vehicles like Mercedes Benz and Toyota Land Cruiser for private use. Now, I import grains from the USA, Canada, Australia, South Africa, and West Africa. We handle over a million MTs of fertilizers annually.

I just delivered 2,000MT of potassium chloride fertilizer and 50,000MT of nitrogen fertilizer. Soft fertilizer stocks are ready, with 500,000MT in storage. Usually, we ship weekly, but this week we’re running low on stocks.

Best,
Friend

email_chain.subject: Re: Commodity Trading Update
email_chain.body:
Hello Friend,

I'm interested in importing spices, fruits, meat, dry goods, hard goods, or cashew nuts. Can I get an account from you in this area? Also, can I secure a barge berth in this country?

Best,
Neko

email_chain.subject: Research on Trade Routes
email_chain.body:
Hey Neko,

I’m doing research about trade routes and wanted to ask a few questions about your country. I'm especially interested in dry goods and soft goods, particularly coal.

Please email me at researcher@example.com.

Best,
Researcher

email_chain.subject: Appreciation and Transition to New Carrier
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Davis,

We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for the excellent job you are doing with our shipping. Over the past year, we have seen significant improvements in your processes, efficiency, and accuracy, and for this, we are very grateful.

At [Shipper's Name], our priority is to provide safe, efficient, and reliable transportation, and we know you hold the same values. For this reason, we wanted to inform you that we have started working with another carrier. They are offering cheaper rates, but you have already shown us that you are a company we can trust. If you find that your costs are higher, please let us know.

Although we are shifting to a different provider, we will always remain committed to your business and will be happy to help you in any way we can.

Let us know if there’s anything we can do for you.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment of 3,200MT of Green Coffee from Sousse to Glasgow
email_chain.body: Dear Ana, I can get it to the port at the end of September, and 28 days’ demurrage will be charged, as the other suppliers require that, as they like their clearance early. Best regards, Rob

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment of 3,200MT of Green Coffee from Sousse to Glasgow

email_chain.subject: Shipment of Copper Cathode from Fujian to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: We have a 12,000MT copper cathode shipment ready from Fujian to Rotterdam, ready in 6 days. Could you advise your best freight rate and let me know if weekend loadings are acceptable? Thank you, Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment of Copper Cathode from Fujian to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Alex, Thank you for your request. I can offer the below FOB quotation to Rotterdam Port, please let me know if you have any questions. Order: Port To: Port Time: Volume: Guangzhou to Rotterdam: 12 days: 6 MT. Rate Quotation: Distance: Volume: FCA/Si MTC: FOB: USD/MT: 2750: 6 MT: FOB Rotterdam: 2611. Comment: Please kindly check my price if it fits your requirement and our customer needs to pay all handling costs at the spot of origin. Sincerely, Transporter

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment of Copper Cathode from Fujian to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Transporter, Thank you for your prompt reply. We will definitely accept your FCA price. We will have two more consignments to Shanghai in about 10-20 days, we hope that you could help us. Additionally, I am contacting you to learn more about the freight market. Is this the best you could do for a delivery from Suzhou to Rotterdam port? Contact us, because your job is not just to find the cheapest solution but to find the solution that is the right price and the best way to use. Telephone: 13396127727. Best regards, Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment of Copper Cathode from Fujian to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Thanks for your message. The port of Rotterdam will be a very good port for us to receive the cargo. However, we would like to reconfirm if you have also opened up a new forwarder in China? If we do not have any other consignments until next year, maybe you will send me a very good rate. Best regards, Transporter

email_chain.subject: Assistance with Cement Shipment
email_chain.body:

Would you be able to assist me with 800MT of cement from Vancouver to Malmo next week? Could you advise your best freight estimate, and do you allow weekend loading?

Regards,
Wally

email_chain.subject: Re: Assistance with Cement Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Wally,

I just received your email. I am sorry to hear of the delay in the cement shipment. This was a last-minute trip for my client, and it is the first time I was asked to send cement by air to Sweden. I have contacted my supply chain and am still waiting on the ETA. We did not even get a shipment to be sent to the forwarder. I am working with my colleagues in the next couple of hours to get this shipment done and hope to hear from them soon.

Best regards,
Mr. Stone

email_chain.subject: Update on Cement Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Wally,

I just wanted to let you know that I did get a shipment to send cement for you. We are sending 8MT as a sample for you, with the remaining amount of 792MT. We will get a date and time to do this.

Best regards,
Mr. Stone

email_chain.subject: Receipt of Cement Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Stone,

Thank you for your email. We received your shipment from the airport at Malmo, Sweden, on the 5th of September.

Thank you,
Johannes

Ari

email_chain.subject: Re: Order for Cement Shipment
email_chain.body:

Kind regards,
Alexander

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalizing Barley Shipment from Constanța to Beirut

email_chain.subject: Inquiry - Maize Shipment from Chicago to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi Marat,

We’d like to send 12,500MT of maize from Chicago to Chile. Any idea what the going rate is on that market at the moment?

Cheers,
Antonia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry - Maize Shipment from Chicago to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi Antonia,

The general market rate in the past has been around $20 per ton, but it is fluctuating depending on the weather. A good approximate would be $23 per ton.

Regards,
Marat

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Conference Material
email_chain.body:
Hi Marat,

I have forwarded you the PowerPoint from the conference. I have a few questions, and if we can meet to discuss the actual way of securing a quote, that would be great.

Best regards,
Antonia

email_chain.subject: Thank You for the Quotation
email_chain.body:
Marat,

Thank you for the quotation that you provided us. It is very competitive, and my boss was really impressed with the support that you provided. She would like to give you our email address to be able to ask any questions that we may have.

Best regards,
Antonia

email_chain.subject: Request for Additional Discounts
email_chain.body:
Hi Marat,

You are in our book of clients for 2016 and will be receiving future leads, depending on how you respond to this email. We had quite a good month as expected, and all our estimates for next month are as per expectation. Would it be possible to send me an email detailing how you can offer us additional discounts? So far you have beaten all competitors in providing us with a fair and transparent price, but we feel you could always lower the price if you add some more value.

Regards,
Antonia

email_chain.subject: Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Hi Marat,

Thanks.

Best regards,
Antonia

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Service
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Mercer,

We’re looking at shipping 3,000MT of nonferrous metals from Hakata to New York. Do you have any available service for early August, and what’s your standard demurrage clause?

Regards,
Stephane

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Shipping Request
email_chain.body:
Mr. Mercer,

I spoke to the Customs broker inquiring about the subject trade. He has confirmed that you’re the best carrier for the specific service we’re looking for. Can you confirm the ability to handle this cargo in August, and what’s your standard demurrage clause for this period?

Please feel free to reach out to me if you have any questions.

Best regards,
Stephane

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Service Proposal
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your proposal. I will get back to you shortly regarding the availability and question on demurrage.

Regards,
Stephane

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Service Availability
email_chain.body:
Mr. Mercer, please find my response regarding the availability of your service to Hakata in early August.

As far as demurrage, our preference is $4.00 a day + $1.50 per hour. Also, would you be able to ship to the Pier 84 terminal in New York City?

Thank you for your prompt response.

Regards,
Stephane

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Service Availability
email_chain.body:
Hi Stephane,

Regarding your request for service to Hakata in early August:

We can ship up to $4.00 a day plus $1.50 per hour. This demurrage will be invoiced, not collected. The Carrier may ship to Pier 84.

Thank you,
David

email_chain.subject: Update on Shipping Request
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Just an update regarding my request for service to Hakata in early August. It’s a job ready to ship from August 1 to August 14. What would be the earliest available departure for this trade?

Did you follow up?

Mr. Mercer, I have a short update regarding my original request. Our client is willing to change the origin to California instead.

Regards,
Stephane

email_chain.subject: Thank You for Great Service
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

I just want to thank you for the great service you provided for our import. It was a great experience, and we will surely come back.

Thank you for the good communication and cooperation with our customs broker.

Best regards,
Stephane

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel for Jet Fuel Shipment
email_chain.body:

I need a vessel for 20,000MT of BP500 jet fuel from Korea to Hong Kong. Could you confirm if a mid-June laycan works for you, and are port dues included in your quote?

Many thanks,
Precious

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel for Jet Fuel Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ng,

Thank you for your prompt reply, and I confirm that a mid-June laycan works for me. Please confirm your availability to help me find a suitable vessel. I am most impressed with your professional handling of the request. Thank you again for your efforts.

Regards,
Precious

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Availability for Jet Fuel Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Khor,

Thank you for your reply. I was on leave, hence the delayed response. I believe that there is ample shipping capacity, however, the slots are very competitive. We will begin discussions on rate once a vessel is identified.

Regards,
Precious

email_chain.subject: Update on Shipping Quotation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lau,

Thank you for all your efforts to secure the shipping quotation. We managed to secure two vessels and are currently in negotiation with the carriers to secure rates for both slots. We will send you an update as soon as we know more.

Regards,
Precious

email_chain.subject: Final Shipping Cost
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Khor,

We secured both slots, and the final cost of shipping will be less than S$20,000.

Many thanks,
Precious

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry for FREYSSINET Orders
email_chain.body:
Dear Gomes,

We just saw the order for FREYSSINET and I wonder if you are planning any further shipments soon. We are available to provide you with a supply chain solution that works and will enable you to ship on a strict ETA. Our project teams have vast experience working with organizations of your size and we are able to guarantee you will get your goods delivered when you need them.

Sincerely,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for FREYSSINET Orders
email_chain.body:
James,

I just saw the email you sent out about our inventory. I appreciate that you took the time to read our order and get back to me. I would like to keep a few thoughts that you brought up in mind during your email to make a decision about our contract.

I am sorry that I had such a hard time when I was trying to place the order. I didn't have a consultant. I did research the prices of FREYSSINET and thought I would do a better job than a consultant. Your note made me think of another idea. Maybe there are even more sources than I could find on my own. There is no doubt that we could get a better price from an agent than a consultant or if you were to provide one, we can save money.

I'm impressed with your analysis.

Best regards,
Gomes

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for FREYSSINET Orders
email_chain.body:
Gomes,

Thanks for responding to my email. I got a lot of information from your email. I'm sure you don't write these responses every day but it really helps a customer.

I'm especially happy about your last thought about the use of an agent or consultant. I did a little research and I learned that you use consultants in about 10% of your orders. This was encouraging to me because we would not be the first. You may want to think about that before you send out the next email. I think we would save enough on fees with a consultant and agent that it would make us come out a lot ahead. Let me know if you'd like to discuss it further.

Sincerely,
James

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Transformer Shipment from Tianjin to Colombo
email_chain.body:
Hello Dave,

We need to move 3,000MT of transformers from Tianjin to Colombo in the next couple of months. Could you please advise on your lead times and rates for this?

Sincerely,
Sue

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Transformer Shipment from Tianjin to Colombo
email_chain.body:
Hi Sue,

I'm glad to see your inquiry for your shipment needs. We provide marine logistic services with our friendly and expert crew members. In addition to the shipping service of your package, we also offer additional services such as door-to-door, pick-up from door, to door delivery, and direct cargo delivery. We handle custom clearance procedures and you can also find a cargo receipt after our arrival in your destination port.

If you have any other questions, don't hesitate to contact us. Thanks for using our service.

Yours faithfully,
Dave

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Transformer Shipment from Tianjin to Colombo
email_chain.body:
Dave,

Yes, I would like to request a pickup of my package from my residence to your depot. I will book my shipping with you. Kindly provide me the address of your warehouse that I can send the package to.

Regards,
Sue

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Transformer Shipment from Tianjin to Colombo
email_chain.body:
Hi Sue,

Thank you for your request to pick up the package to our warehouse. We have a large shipping office on the east side of the town. You can send the package to our office at this address: 1234 Marine Way, East Town.

I will let you know the shipping amount and other information shortly.

Yours sincerely,
Dave

This is to let you know that we are delayed with an additional 200 MT of base chemicals. Can you please assist us in finding another space on board your vessel as the one I gave you yesterday is not available? I’m afraid we won’t be able to make the payment this time.

Thanks,

email_chain.subject: Chartering Inquiry for Fraternite Fuel Oil
email_chain.body: We’re looking for 6,500MT capacity for chartering fraternite fuel oil from Malaysia to Cairns. The earliest laycan is this Thursday, 1st November, and the estimated time of delivery is 2nd December. What’s your usual demurrage rate? Please let me know asap if you can assist. Many thanks, Kyle

email_chain.subject: Re: Chartering Inquiry for Fraternite Fuel Oil
email_chain.body: Thank you for your inquiry. We will forward the information to our freight forwarder for confirmation. Please contact us when you receive our proposal so that we may continue with the tender.

email_chain.subject: Re: Chartering Inquiry for Fraternite Fuel Oil
email_chain.body: We’d like to know the approximate volume. Are you talking about a specific vessel? This can’t be too long an email.

email_chain.subject: Re: Chartering Inquiry for Fraternite Fuel Oil
email_chain.body: Of course. 7k tons. And we'll need it by the end of next week.

email_chain.subject: Weekly Sailing Schedule
email_chain.body: The weekly sailing schedule is Wednesday. Please confirm your booking as soon as possible. We have 15,000MT to charter from Malaysia to Egypt. LCL or FCL. The earliest laycan is this Wednesday 10th June and the estimated time of delivery is Friday 12th June. Thank you.

email_chain.subject: Re: Weekly Sailing Schedule
email_chain.body: Thank you for your enquiry. We have freight to Egypt. Please let me know if you require any more details or details on rates.

email_chain.subject: Request for Quotes
email_chain.body: We are requesting quotes for the below-mentioned cargoes. 1. 4000MT agri produce from Pune to Telangana on 11th April and 13th April. 2. 1300MT Agri produce from Chennai to Kerala on 20th April and 27th April. 3. 1500MT Agri produce from Coimbatore to Pondicherry on 22nd April and 26th April. Kindly revert with the prices once you are done. Thanks and regards, Srikar

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quotes
email_chain.body: Reference no. HUN (29-4-21)1202-1870. Dear Sir, The following are the details of the company for your consideration.

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry for Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Pinto,

Could you please suggest the best way to ship 9,800MT of palm oil from Mataro to Dar es Salaam?

Regards,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Dear Victor,

Thanks for your email.
We will be happy to get back to you in one business day with our suggestions.

Kind regards,
John Pinto

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

We really appreciate your email.
Could you please suggest which method will be the fastest way to get the oil to Dar es Salaam?

Regards,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Dear Victor,

First of all, you have made a very good decision picking us as your preferred carrier. We will be very glad to get your cargo to Dar es Salaam.
For this, we will be using the "Fast Liner" shipping method. Please note that the "Fast Liner" service does not include any delays caused by Customs.
If you want to expedite your cargo through customs in Dar es Salaam, please let us know.

Kind regards,
John Pinto

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Hello Victor,

Thank you for sending your document on the "Fast Liner" method. Would you mind sending us your credit application to speed up the payment and import clearance process? Please note that this document is very crucial for us to process your cargo.

Kind regards,
John Pinto

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Here is the credit application and a copy of my passport for your information. I am looking forward to receiving your cargo soon.

Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

Just to be sure, could you please tell us how long you have before our final shipment date? In addition, could you please tell us how long it would take you to process the payment?

Kind regards,
John Pinto

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I have received your documents, and I have to admit that your service is great. Please let me know how long it will take you to ship my cargo? I will expect you to get in touch with me on time to help me meet my target.

Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Hello Victor,

Thanks for sending us your documents. We have received them on Friday and we have started to process your cargo. It will take us five days to get the shipment ready. Please keep in mind that this is just an estimate.

Kind regards,
John Pinto

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I am expecting my cargo at the end of next week. Could you please let me know if this will be a problem for you to get it?

Kind regards,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Next Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning John,

How about some big orders? Would you be able to clear the next big shipment on time?

Sincerely,
Marion

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Haugland,

How’s business?

I’m in the market for 4,000 MT of fertilizers from Durban to Farquhar. What’s your best rate?

Regards,
Gunnar

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Sir,

We have a bulk shipment from Durban to our client in New Zealand that is currently sold and docked at Durban. The vessel is due to depart on 20 February and load 5,000 MT of fertilizer at Durban to supply the orders to our client. Can we discuss a price of $35.00 per MT?

Regards,
Richard.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Richard,

The vessel is on schedule. We are glad to load your shipment. We can offer a competitive price of $33.50 per MT. We have the product ready in our warehouse. We are offering Fertigo 18-26-0. Do you have any specifications? If not, we can specify any combination. If you need to specify quantities for a particular customer, please inform me. I will get back to you by Monday.

Regards,
Gunnar

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
Mr. Haugland,

I’m ready to load the shipment on Thursday or Friday. I would like to load 1,500 MT for our first customer, 2,000 MT for our second customer, and 2,000 MT for our third customer. Do you have any questions? We can call on Thursday if you prefer. I need to contact the shipping company immediately to get your order on the vessel. It is almost full and we need to space your cargo carefully. I’m ready to discuss any load strategy that you may require. Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions or concerns.

Regards,
Richard.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
Mr. Haugland,

We appreciate your time in responding to our inquiries. We have made a final decision on your offer. We are offering 2,500 MT of Fertigo 18-26-0, which meets our customers' requirements. We are still interested in the 4,000 MT load you offered us in our first inquiry, but this time at $33.00 per MT. If you can confirm this, we can proceed immediately. We have to be flexible with the load strategy. It is our first load to Farquhar Island so we have to carefully manage the weight distribution on the vessel to ensure a safe journey. We will not load more than 30% of the cargo on deck. I have sent you an email with our customer details for confirmation purposes.

Regards,
Richard.

email_chain.subject: Shipping Advice for Jewelry from Mexico to Japan

email_chain.subject: Holding Cargo Under DAF in Riyadh
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Yamaguchi,

Our client just transferred some ethanol to the tank in Riyadh, but they cannot receive the shipper’s IRB until next week. Could you hold the cargo for 48 hours under DAF for free while waiting for the permit?

Best regards,
Paddy

email_chain.subject: Re: Holding Cargo Under DAF in Riyadh
email_chain.body:
Dear Paddy,

The client just got the IRB from Saudi customs, and the transportation is proceeding to the port. The shipper is waiting for the discharge of the cargo. However, it seems that the port could not complete the unloading because of the low manpower, as we received from the Saudi agent. The cargo will arrive in Riyadh in 48 hours. Could you keep the cargo in the tank under DAF for 48 hours? I could not wait any longer for free.

Best regards,
Jon

email_chain.subject: Re: Holding Cargo Under DAF in Riyadh
email_chain.body:
I would like to confirm that your client has already transferred some ethanol to the tank in Riyadh. It is likely that the tank was not fully filled because of the shortage of manpower. The cargo was successfully discharged and delivered. I hope to work with you on this opportunity again in the future.

Thank you for sending the emails above.

Best regards,
Yamaguchi

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry for Raw Material
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Captain Schuppe,

We’re planning to ship 6,000MT of raw material from Rotterdam to Algeciras. Could you please advise of any available laycan slots, as well as any additional freight charges?

Regards,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Vessel Bids and Loading Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Captain Schuppe,

We’ve been receiving bids from the following vessels: Exxpresser, Futura, Goya, Super Valiant, Tyra, and Valspar. Could you please confirm that your vessel is able to load 6,000MT at Rotterdam?

Regards,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Bids and Loading Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Good Afternoon Ryan,

Our vessel, the Exxpresser, will be arriving in Rotterdam in 8 days. She is scheduled to arrive at 1:30 PM Rotterdam time on July 1st. We are looking at offloading her to a spot in Algeciras. Please advise on the following:

1. How will we communicate with your ship once we are ready to load the cargo?
2. How do you pay your pilot?
3. What will be the weekly rate to pilot your ship?
4. Do you have a safety system on board?

Regards,
Captain Schuppe

email_chain.subject: Pilot Availability and Safety Systems
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Captain Schuppe,

Your offer to pilot our vessel, as well as the safety systems, checklist, and safety instructions were all well received. I have passed these on to our client. However, there is an issue we had not discussed yet, and we would like to get this sorted out before I can proceed with the rest of your request.

It appears that our regular pilot cannot make it to the port, and we were asking if you would be available to pilot our vessel on July 1st.

With respect,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Port Pilot Unavailability
email_chain.body:
Hello Captain Schuppe,

On June 30th, the port pilot for our vessel was unable to go to Rotterdam. We have no idea how long this issue will last, however, we are in the midst of our planning phase. We will know more once we have information from the cargo owners and our client. Please do not delay.

Regards,
Ryan

email_chain.body:
Hi Sam,

I'm writing on behalf of International Transport Management Services (ITMS). We are an Asian broker based out of Dubai, United Arab Emirates with 20 years of experience in the logistics and transport industry. We specialize in handling cargo for international suppliers. We ship products to Dubai, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Oman, Kuwait, and India. We have extensive experience working with major LCL consolidators and Airfreight forwarders, but also with small and large groups of consolidators.

In short, we are more than capable of handling your shipment needs.

Best regards,
Sam
E-mail: sam@example.com

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Request from Mombasa to Dar Es Salaam
email_chain.body:

Jason

email_chain.subject: Response Needed: U.S. Presidential Elections
email_chain.body:
Hi Milt,

We are still waiting for your response regarding the U.S. Presidential elections. Please advise by Monday.

Thanks,
Cassie

email_chain.subject: Re: Response Needed: U.S. Presidential Elections
email_chain.body:
Hi Cassie,

Thank you for your email dated 21/10/19. Your party won the most number of seats in the recent U.S. elections and you have been asked to form the government. This was one of the most keenly contested elections in history and you and your party have the ability to form a majority in the U.S. House of Representatives. In response to the email below, your party plans to use the $100,000 gift from your Party Unity Coalition to fundraise for the initial payrolls of employees and contractors in the new government, then to contribute a further $50,000 each month to this effort for a period of 4 months.

My boss also offered to fundraise a further $500,000 and to make this contribution and future contributions tax-deductible. However, in view of the fact that the U.S. has no tax system...

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Party Unity Coalition
email_chain.body:
Hi Cassie,

Thanks for your email. It is nice to be having a 2-way communication about this matter.

As you requested, I am sending you an attached email with details and contact information for the Party Unity Coalition which I will be sure to follow up with and keep you in the loop regarding.

Let me know if you have any other questions and I look forward to hearing from you.

Thanks,
Milt

email_chain.subject: Financial Arrangement Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Cassie,

Thank you for your email dated 25/10/19. I am attaching the email correspondence with Mr. Marcus Barnes from the Party Unity Coalition. The financial arrangement that we will be undertaking is that the Party Unity Coalition will raise the initial $50,000 each month for 4 months, then to top up the initial contributions with a further $50,000 each month for 3 months. Thereafter, the contributions will be $50,000 each month for the subsequent 3 months. Total contributions are $220,000. The contributions will be used to fundraise for the initial payrolls of employees and contractors in the new government and to cover subsequent months. In view of the fact that the U.S. has no tax system, I have asked Mr. Barnes to make this contribution and future contributions tax-deductible. In addition, my boss has also offered...

email_chain.subject: Re: Financial Arrangement Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Milt,

Thanks for getting back to me. I have forwarded your email to my manager, Inga. I can tell you that our company will make a contribution of $500,000 to support your election campaign as you had hoped. We will also make the contribution tax-deductible. I have attached the email with the details of the funds and contributions that we plan to make.

Thanks,
Cassie

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Contributions
email_chain.body:
Hi Cassie,

Your team has raised $220,000 from the Party Unity Coalition. I will be sending an invoice to the Coalition to confirm the arrangement and look forward to hearing from you.

Thanks,
Milt

email_chain.body:

Thanks for getting back to me. Please accept our invoice for $220,000 (including $50,000 to be distributed over the next 4 months). We would like to make the...

email_chain.body:
Mr. Wallach,

This is Meribor. I have a very special offer for you. I have some work for you that will not take a lot of time or energy. If you take the job I can give you half of the money upfront. I think you will find the job easy and the pay outstanding. I need a single person. No partners.

Job Description:
1. I am moving illegal goods from Port Benda to Port Wussco on the submarine Andrea, via Port Aini. Andrea will be in Port Benda for 3 days.
2. You must find the exact arrival time of the Andrea. The Andrea will leave Port Wussco the same day for Port Minab.
3. You must find a way to get the goods safely from Andrea to Port Wussco. That is important.

email_chain.subject: Shipment Inquiry for Aluminum from Mombasa to Haiphong
email_chain.body:
Hi Koen, 

I have a 6,500MT shipment of aluminum from Mombasa to Haiphong. Is it still feasible for us to ship by 19 July? We’re worried about tariff risk due to COP26, so please let us know your best offer. 

Many thanks, 
Adrian

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Inquiry for Aluminum from Mombasa to Haiphong
email_chain.body:
Koen, 

I hope you’re well. I’ve read through the COP26 tax proposal with interest. As you are aware, the EDC tax rate will increase to 6% in 2023, which means it could reach $70 / mt if the rate doesn’t rise again in the following years. Therefore, it’s important for us to ship this order before COP26 takes effect, as we’re planning on increasing our exposure to aluminum. 

I have a few questions: 
1. The current EDC tax rate is 3% and there’s an additional 3% tax in 2023 and 4% in 2024. Is there any clarity on what the rate will be in the following years? I know this may change, but it’s difficult to predict. 

Many thanks, 
Adrian

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Inquiry for Aluminum from Mombasa to Haiphong
email_chain.body:
Koen, 

We also have a product which is looking to ship in November. Do you think it is worth considering a new LCOE contract on top of the cost for us? 

I've sent the documentation in the email. Please let me know if there are any issues. I also attached the FMC Declaration to see if that's something you need. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions. 

Many thanks, 
Adrian

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Inquiry for Aluminum from Mombasa to Haiphong
email_chain.body:
Hi Koen, 

We've made our selection and are ready to ship this consignment. However, I've received an invoice from the bank asking for a second payment in advance, as the first payment was insufficient to cover the costs. I believe this is for the ELT payment, which was done in May. 

However, I didn’t receive any communication from you about this. I was waiting for an update before making the payment. If it’s ELT payment, it shouldn’t be this high, should it? 

Many thanks for your help, 
Adrian

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Inquiry for Aluminum from Mombasa to Haiphong
email_chain.body:
Hi Koen, 

We’re back in touch with you because I’ve just been informed about the following: The shipping company that we’ve been working with over the past few months has decided to halt their operations in our country. We were notified yesterday, as they’re on a “closed loop” operation. 

Many thanks, 
Adrian

email_chain.subject: Request for Rate Quotation for Chemical Products
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. James,

I am interested in the offloading of 1500MT of chemical products in Asia. The unit is 2500GP and we need to complete it within the next 30 days. Could you please provide an immediate rate quotation?

Thanks,
Daniel Mills

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Rate Quotation for Chemical Products
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your email of 12th June inquiring about our 2500GP rate with our Chemical Company in Asia.

As you might be aware, we have a strict shipping program with our vendor in the Far East. Your vessel will arrive at our docks in the morning of 15th June 2020 and will be leaving at 15:30 PM on the same day.

Would you please check our rates below and let me know what can work for you?

1. Per Unit Rate (USD/MT)
   2500GP: 27,650

2. Consolidation Basis (USD/MT)
   2500GP: 27,650

We are anticipating to start loading your cargo around 16th June 2020. We will be using standard SWB bags (1250 kgs each).

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Rate Quotation for Chemical Products
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your email. We will have the full cargo to load as per our shipping program for the container you mentioned. It will be delivered to your docks on the 15th of June 2020.

Thank you,
Daniel Mills

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipment Order
email_chain.body:
Greetings Mr. Mills,

We are pleased to confirm our shipment order of 2500GP of Chemical Materials from our ship’s berth at <Your Company’s Port> on 16th June 2020 to the same port. Our shipping line will be <Vessel Name> which will be arriving at the port on 15th June 2020.

Would you please let me know how much time is required for loading our shipment? Our Cargo will be delivered to your port as follows:
20th June 2020
<Your Company’s Port>

Thank you for your kind response.

email_chain.subject: Cargo Availability and Scheduling
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Benjamin,

We need to know your future availability to avoid cargo delays. We want to send a cargo of lime three times in a row, and then in two weeks, we want to send a cargo of vegetable oil. You have a dry cargo vessel available to move the lime, but the vessel will be available for the vegetable oil after a two-week laytime. Do you have any vessels that can handle the cargo of lime that you can let us know now and then again the day before the date you are available for the vegetable oil?

You can tell us when you are available for the first cargo, as we are also looking for a vessel.

We would be thankful if you could advise us with your present availability.

Thank you,
Luis

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Availability and Scheduling
email_chain.body:
Hi Luis,

I think we are in good agreement. Our availability is as follows:

With the vessel 'KT BV', we are available from 12/27/13 for loading lime. We will be available for another load of lime on 1/2/14 and for a load of vegetable oil on 1/15/14. It looks as if we will be available for your vegetable oil at this time.

We can also handle your lime cargo on our vessel 'RHV BV' starting on 12/27/13. On 12/29/13, we can also handle a load of vegetable oil.

Sincerely,
Nina

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Availability and Scheduling
email_chain.body:
Hi Nina,

Thank you for your offer. Your load of lime from 12/27/13, available on your vessel 'KT BV', is acceptable to us.

Thank you,
Luis

email_chain.subject: Cargo Load Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Benjamin,

I have just contacted the transporter who will be loading your vessel 'KT BV'. The transporter is planning to load the vessel this morning. I do not have a complete bill of lading, but we can proceed with a load confirmation if you wish. However, we need a copy of the bill of lading and a signed cargo receipt. Would you please advise us when you will receive your papers?

Thank you,
Luis

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Load Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Luis,

We are pleased to confirm that we will receive the cargo receipt from your shipper by tomorrow (12/31/13). In addition, we have confirmed that our master will receive the bill of lading. I do not know when he will be arriving, but he will be available at our pier tomorrow (12/31/13).

Sincerely,
Nina

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Load Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello Luis,

I have sent you an email in regard to your cargo. I have a copy of the signed cargo receipt. My master will arrive at our pier on 1/1/14 around 10 a.m. If the bill of lading arrives before that time, we can send you a copy of the bill of lading.

I would be very thankful if you could confirm if we can do this.

Sincerely,
Nina

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request for Corn Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sunny!

Our tanks are at normal temperature for all of our destinations except for the north of England, where we will deliver from a normal temperature tank. Your cargo will need to be offloaded on October 7th and delivered on October 12th. We will be able to give you the exact location of the delivery on the day of the cargo.

We will contact you with a freight quote as soon as possible.

Regards,
Jade

email_chain.subject: Request for Demurrage Rate and Berth Restrictions
email_chain.body:
Good morning.

We’re looking at 4,100MT of anthracite coal from West Bengal to Kuching. Could you please confirm your demurrage rate and the weekend berth restrictions, and would you anticipate receiving a lumpsum freight quote?

Regards,
Jade

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Demurrage Rate and Berth Restrictions
email_chain.body:
Morning.

Thank you for your email.

The demurrage charges for your requirement would be USD 10 per day subject to the ICD storage fee. We will require a two-week clearance. We can provide you with a lump sum quote for this requirement upon receipt of the details including your FCO, B/L details, and DCS information.

Your samples for coal testing can be shipped along with the main consignment, or you can instruct us to receive the sample at the ICD and do a pickup from the ICD itself.

Please note that we are unable to open your samples at the ICD itself. This can be done at the port facility where your shipment is due to be loaded onto the vessel.

Your vessel would have a berth from 26 July – 3 August. Therefore, we will be able to load your shipment between these dates.

Should

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Demurrage Rate and Berth Restrictions
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your prompt response.

Could you please provide the additional information?

Are you able to process the cargo under my terms & conditions?

Are you able to send the terms & conditions via email?

How can I send you the completed quotation?

Regards,
Jade

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Demurrage Rate and Berth Restrictions
email_chain.body:
Thanks Jade for your prompt response,

It’s my pleasure to provide you the requested information:

The sample testing will be done at the port facility where the cargo is due to be loaded. We will need to have a sample FCO for each item we are receiving. When the cargo is tested, we will only have the test report for each item, we will be unable to know the quantity of each item separately. The invoice for the samples will be generated as a separate invoice from the main cargo invoice.

Would you please confirm whether you can accept our standard terms and

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipment Scheduling
email_chain.body:
Hello Alex,

I need to schedule a shipment of 3,200MT of diesel from Venezuela to Rotterdam. I have 8 deliveries planned from July 15 to August 1. How much is your deposit? Do you prefer payment by wire transfer or cash?

Looking forward to your reply,
Tal

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipment Scheduling
email_chain.body:
Hi Tal,

Thank you for the inquiry. We will be glad to proceed with your request. Our minimum deposit amount is US$100,000. Since you are requesting 8 shipments, our total minimum deposit would be US$800,000, to be made in 8 installments of US$100,000 each. This amount will be deducted from the total value of your shipments. For instance, if you are shipping 3,200MT of diesel at US$500 per MT, the total cost of your shipment would be US$1,600,000. US$800,000 will be deducted from this amount, making the total cost US$800,000. Our advance payment requirement is to guarantee your shipment. This amount will be considered as a surety for your freight charges.

Regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Further Clarification on Deposit Requirement
email_chain.body:
Hi Tal,

I am sorry for any misunderstanding. It is difficult to obtain such a large amount of money in short notice, which is why we require a higher deposit amount than what most of our clients usually pay. Our advance payment requirement is to guarantee your shipment and to ensure that you will be able to pay for our freight charges. This amount will be considered as a surety for your freight charges. Our forwarders are more risk-averse than most people think. They have limited resources and they have to spend most of their money on freight. They do not have the luxury of taking a chance on any shipment, and I fully understand their concerns.

I hope you have a good day.

Regards,
Alex

email_chain.body:
Hi Katie,

We’d like to move 6,000MT of liquid sugar to Surabaya using a 27,000MT Heavy lift/Project cargo Carrier. Do you have availability for load by the 20th of June? Also, could you provide details on your earliest demurrage structure?

Thank you for your time.

Best regards,
Brian

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Cargo Shipment to Surabaya
email_chain.body:
Dear Brian,

Thank you for your enquiry. Unfortunately, we do not have any availability for cargo loading by the 20th of June. There is a Bunker Bill due for our vessels, which is expected to be paid by the 13th of June and must be settled for our vessel to load and depart from the US. The earliest we would be available would be on the 25th of June.

As for demurrage, we would like to discuss this with you as the amount and structure of demurrage is not fixed. Our rates start from USD1.00 per cubic foot per day, for which the terms are:

Shipowner's Demurrage Policy

A) FOB Conditions : Shipowner's Demurrage Rates :
US$ 1.00 per cubic foot per day, subject to a maximum annual rate per cubic foot of US$ 75

Best regards,
Katie

email_chain.subject: Update on Cargo Availability
email_chain.body:
Sorry Brian,

After a quick review of our schedule, there are no available slots until August.

Thanks and best regards,
Katie

Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Clinker Shipment
email_chain.body:
Due to the complexity of bulk rates, both simple and indexed escalation clauses are commonly used in the sea cargo market. Bulk rates are based on bunker price and tonnage. Escalation clauses are used to implement the benefits of a bunker cost increase and prevent the carrier from changing the contract rate and extending it through an escalation clause. Generally, escalation clauses are used when a contract purchaser is concerned about the impact of a bunker price increase. Should the bunker price increase, bulk rates and contracts are usually adjusted accordingly. A bunker escalation clause allows the parties to index their contracts on a timely basis rather than having to wait until a contract is being renewed or terminated. In addition, an escalation clause in a contract increases the incentive for the parties to achieve cost savings by allowing the buyer to negotiate an adjustment when the seller is benefiting from a rise in the cost.

Regards,
Shipping Department

email_chain.subject: Demurrage Structure Enquiry for Naphtha Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hi Kape,

We’re organizing a 3,500MT cargo of Naphtha from Singapore to Fujairah. What’s your usual demurrage structure?

Cheers,
George

email_chain.subject: Re: Demurrage Structure Enquiry for Naphtha Cargo
email_chain.body:
Thanks for the request, George.

I’m willing to offer you a 3-day demurrage for the cargo based on our current norms. Please let me know if you need further details.

Regards,
Kape Gas

email_chain.subject: Re: Demurrage Structure Enquiry for Naphtha Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hi George,

Thanks for your enquiry. We are honored to serve your company. However, we require at least 10 tonnes of your cargo in order to cover our transport cost.

Our rate is $3.50 per tonne per day. Your first payment of $35.00 shall be due once you receive the cargo. We would like your usual terms of payment for freight to be as per the email from last week.

Regards,
Kape Gas

email_chain.subject: Contract for Naphtha Cargo Service
email_chain.body:
Hi Kape,

The cargo details are as follows:

We would like to contract your services for the cargo. Kindly email back your quote and terms and conditions.

Thanks,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Contract for Naphtha Cargo Service
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Below is our quote and terms and conditions. Kindly confirm the contract with us and let us know if you have any questions. We look forward to working together with you.

Regards,
Kape Gas

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir, 

I’d like to send 6000 MT of corn through the port of Savannah to Philadelphia. The ship is loading from 01-15 to 01-20. I need your offer on ex shipboard FOB vessel terms. 

Thank you, 
Ms. Meggie

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Meggie, 

Thanks for submitting your request for import and export shipments. 
I will review your request and contact you shortly. 

Thanks, 
Edith

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Edith, 

I am the Chairman of North Georgia Grocery. I have over 300,000 pounds of corn in my storage. I'd like to send 400,000 pounds from Savannah, GA. We would like to receive a quote with a FOB Savannah shipment. We need the corn to arrive in Philadelphia in December 2015. Please email me the best price you can offer me, and also include your terms in your email. 

Thank you, 
Mr. Mike North

email_chain.subject: Request for Wheat and Corn Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir, 

I'm the owner of XYZ Corporation in Norfolk, VA. I need to buy 300,000 pounds of wheat. Please send me a quote on your offer. I would like to order 400,000 lbs of corn from your company. Please quote me with FOB vessel terms. 

Thank you, 
Fred

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Wheat and Corn Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Fred, 

Thank you for contacting our firm. I have reviewed your email and you have requested us to buy 300,000 lbs of wheat for Philadelphia. Since you did not mention any quantities for corn, I am assuming that you need 300,000 pounds of wheat. I will send you a price offer via email and also my terms and conditions. Please send me an email indicating if this is what you want. 

Thank you, 
Ms. Edith

email_chain.subject: New Deal for Corn Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Anna,

I have just closed a deal for 5,000MT of corn oil from Dhahran to Naples. Is that something you can do? Also, is there any freight payment system that might suit my client’s needs?

Kind Regards,
Terry

email_chain.subject: Re: New Deal for Corn Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Terry,

Yes, I can send you an offer for this shipment and let you know about the freight payment system. Thank you for letting us know that you have a new client, we appreciate it.

Best regards,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Logistics for Mr. Russell's Order
email_chain.body:
Hi Charlotte,

I’m following up on Mr. Russell’s email regarding his order. Our logistics department will be able to handle this order. Could you please provide the logistics costs and confirm if they will be in addition to our land transport rate?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Logistics for Mr. Russell's Order
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Mr. Russell recently confirmed his wishes for the new pallets and asked if they would be ready in time for delivery in 3 weeks. He is looking for more product than initially thought.

To summarize:
- Mr. Russell ordered 20 new pallets for 20,000 units.
- Delivery is scheduled in 3 weeks.
- We can handle this with the current pallets, but it will be tight.

You mentioned discussing shipping costs with Mr. Russell. We are on the hook for a $2,000 deposit. We can run the numbers and let you know the shipping costs.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,
Tami

email_chain.subject: Re: Logistics for Mr. Russell's Order
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Tami’s response has been queued for our Logistics Manager to review. Shall I check back in 10 minutes to see what the response has been?

Mr. Russell wants you to confirm delivery for next Tuesday. The first pallet should be ready for delivery on Friday.

Thanks,
Charlotte

email_chain.subject: Re: Logistics for Mr. Russell's Order
email_chain.body:
Charlotte,

Tami is about to call us and confirm delivery. Thanks for the reminder.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Rate Inquiry for Wine Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Peter, We have 6,200MT of wine to ship from Sydney to Shanghai. We'd like your rate for a mid-December cargo. What should your best price be? Thanks, Rod

email_chain.subject: Customer Feedback

email_chain.subject: Re: Invoice for Payment

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Glycerine Shipment from Hamburg to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear DTC,

We plan to ship 8,500MT of glycerine from Hamburg to Qingdao. Please advise the load density, lumpsum rate, and if you have a vessel suited for this cargo type.

Regards,
Sebastian

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Glycerine Shipment from Hamburg to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sebastian,

I am selling below DTC of your original request. The cargo will be sailed in Dec 2015. Kindly confirm the forwarder number.

Regards,
DTC

email_chain.subject: Details for Glycerine Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Sebastian,

As per your request, details are mentioned below. Please contact our forwarder or directly to us.

Regards,
DTC

email_chain.subject: Re: Details for Glycerine Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

We shall not send any formal quotation, since our DTC (Direct to Customer) rates are now becoming lower, even than some of our regular global agents. We would require forwarder details, if you have one in mind. Also please confirm when the vessel, loaded with glycerine, will be sailing out, as we want to have this booked in advance, so as to avoid any problems later on.

Regards,
DTC

email_chain.subject: Re: Details for Glycerine Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear DTC,

Thank you for the information. We will provide the forwarder details shortly and confirm the sailing date.

Regards,
Sebastian

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Dear Jane, Could you please provide a freight quote for a shipment of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai? Let me know if you need any additional details. Best regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thank you for your request. Could you please specify the cargo size and preferred Incoterm? Regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Dear Jane, The cargo size is 50,000 MT and we prefer FOB terms. Could you also include details on the vessel? Best regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thank you for the details. We can offer a vessel with a DWT of 70,000 MT and LOA of 220 meters. The starting freight quote is USD 20 per MT. Please confirm if this works for you. Regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Dear Jane, The quote looks good. Could you provide the laytime start and end dates? Also, what are the demurrage terms? Best regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Hi John, The laytime will start on 2023-11-01 and end on 2023-11-15. The demurrage is USD 5,000 per day. Please confirm if everything is satisfactory. Regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Dear Jane, Everything looks good. Please proceed with the booking. Best regards, John

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi John, The booking is confirmed. Thank you for your business. Regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body: Dear Jane, Thank you for the confirmation. Looking forward to a smooth shipment. Best regards, John

email_chain.subject: Shipment Update
email_chain.body: Hi John, The vessel has departed from Newcastle. Estimated arrival in Shanghai is on 2023-11-15. Regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Update
email_chain.body: Dear Jane, Thank you for the update. Please keep me posted on any changes. Best regards, John

email_chain.subject: Final Shipment Update
email_chain.body: Hi John, The vessel has arrived in Shanghai. The shipment is complete. Regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Shipment Update
email_chain.body: Dear Jane, Thank you for the successful shipment. Looking forward to future collaborations. Best regards, John

email_chain.subject: Future Collaboration
email_chain.body: Hi John, We're glad to hear that. Please reach out for any future shipment needs. Regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Offer for 20,000MT of Ores from Chile to Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Martinez,

You have a cargo for us for about 20,000MT of ores from Chile to Antwerp. Our offer is 70,- per ton net. What's the cargo terms and voyage details?

Best regards,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for 20,000MT of Ores from Chile to Antwerp
email_chain.body:
I would like to confirm the offer of 70,- per ton for the shipment from Chile to Antwerp. The cargo terms are FCA for loading and port-to-port for transportation. The cargo is fresh steel scrap, 20,000MT. Our recommended date of shipment is on April 30th 2019. Can we start negotiations on your part?

Best regards,
Valeriya

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for 20,000MT of Ores from Chile to Antwerp
email_chain.body:
I would like to inform you that we would be pleased to assist you with the negotiation of our product offer. You can contact us via email or give us a call on our phone number, to get more information on the above offer. We will be happy to help you with any information or arrangement you require.

Please confirm your date of shipment and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

Thank you and have a nice day.

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for 20,000MT of Ores from Chile to Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Thank you very much for your confirmation of the shipment from Chile to Antwerp, FCA on April 30th 2019. Our team is reviewing your offer. We will be in contact within the next 48 hours.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for 20,000MT of Ores from Chile to Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your mail about “The Offer”. It seems that you want to know about something, so I am sending a response to your message.

This is a quick note to ask you a few questions about some arrangements regarding our goods. Do you have any special requirements for the shipment? Are there any special terms and conditions we need to keep in mind?

As far as I understand, our offer is 70,- per ton for the shipment.

email_chain.subject: Meeting Request in San Francisco
email_chain.body:
Hi Julie,

Please let me know when you will be in San Francisco. I would like to meet with you regarding our current Accounts payables reconciliations issues.

Best regards,
Marko

email_chain.subject: Discrepancy in 1099s and Payables Vouchers
email_chain.body:
Hi Julie,

We have recently received the 1099s for all of the vendors we pay on a monthly basis. It seems as though the information reported does not match the information reported on the payables vouchers. Please look into this immediately as we will be required to notify each of our vendors of the discrepancy.

Please advise.

Best Regards,
Annette

email_chain.subject: Re: Discrepancy in 1099s and Payables Vouchers
email_chain.body:
Hi Julie,

I have received the email and the 1099s from Marko and Annette. Let me see if I can figure out what is going on. Is it possible that there is some sort of account error?

I will get back to you tomorrow with my findings.

Best Regards,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Discrepancy in 1099s and Payables Vouchers
email_chain.body:
Hi Andrew,

I have been looking over the 1099s and accounts payables vouchers. Although the 1099 information and the accounts payables vouchers do not match, it does appear that the payables vouchers are correct. There seems to be an error in the 1099.

How would the 1099 information get entered wrong? I was unable to find anything to indicate there was a discrepancy.

Can you

email_chain.subject: Status Inquiry for Steel Plates Order
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Gualtieri,

I’m writing to inquire about the status of our order for 12,900MT of steel plates from Rotterdam to El País. We are currently facing issues with customs clearance and would like to know how you are handling this situation.

Please respond to this email at your earliest convenience.

Regards,
Greg

email_chain.subject: Re: Status Inquiry for Steel Plates Order
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your email regarding our port clearance issues.

Unfortunately, we haven’t been able to clear our shipment through customs due to COVID-19. We understand that this is due to increased security measures put in place by the government.

To ensure we are fully compliant with all necessary regulations, we will have to delay the delivery of your goods. We have been in communication regarding this matter and can confirm that progress is on track.

If there is anything further you would like us to do in relation to this order or any other queries you may have, please do not hesitate to get in touch.

Best Regards,
Rob

email_chain.subject: Updated ETA for MS Mangrovia
email_chain.body:
Good morning Anders,

I have an updated ETA for the MS Mangrovia. I am expecting her on March 4th. I will update you with the port of discharge information once I know.

Yours truly,
Ricardo

email_chain.subject: MS Mangrovia Departure Update
email_chain.body:
Good morning Anders,

Yes, I believe her departure from Nantong will occur on the 4th of March. She is now 3 days ahead of schedule and is operating in the Taiwan Strait. I have included the arrival at Sydney below.

Shanghai
Arrival Date: 03/04/18 10:00:00
Departure Date: 03/04/18 11:00:00
Arrival Time: 10:00 AM
Departure Time: 11:00 AM
Location: Port of Call
Updated: 03/04/2018

Regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: MS Mangrovia Arrival Details
email_chain.body: Good morning Anders, She will be arriving in the late morning/early afternoon, but not in the Anchorage Channel. Instead, we have scheduled her to berth at Shed No. 5 at the Shed No. 5 at Port of Sydney - this is also known as the St. Heliers Wharf. Regards, Tony

email_chain.subject: Hull Transfer Request
email_chain.body:
G'day Anders,

If you could get your yard to transfer the hull, from 05 Shetland to Shed No. 5, we can then get her to push in for final handover. If that's not possible please advise.

Regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Dry Ports in Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Dear Bernard,

Do Dry Ports exist in Vietnam? I need to send around 4,000kgs of auto parts from HCMC to Dalat, just passing through. Any idea what the charges would be?

Thank you,
Jack

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Dry Ports in Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Dear Jack,

Thank you for your email. Indeed, we have dry ports in Vietnam. Vietnam does have an import office called Sava. The office of Sava is in Hai Phong port. The service charge for Sava is $100 per 40’ container. However, we don't have many customers using Sava, since we don't provide special service for handling duty.

If you have any other questions, please feel free to contact me.

Thank you for your time.

Sincerely yours,
Bernard

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Dry Ports in Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Thanks Bernard,

It sounds like we should not use Sava. Is the tariff $1,650 per container? The website states $600 per container, but is that for everything we need to pay? Or just the charge for Sava?

Thanks,
Jack

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Dry Ports in Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Hi Bernard,

Thank you for your information. The charges for your services look reasonable, however, I still need to check for the final quotation. Please advise on that.

Also, I need to ask, is the term of payment 30% before shipping out the container, and the balance upon arrival to Cambodia?

Thank you.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Dry Ports in Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Hello Bernard,

Thanks again for the information on your services, however, I still need to check for the quotation. Can you send me the PDF format on it?

Thanks.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Dry Ports in Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Hi Bernard,

Thank you for sending me the PDF file, but I still need to check for the quotation. I need to know the port of loading in China and the transit time.

Thanks.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Dry Ports in Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Dear Bernard,

Thank you very much.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Dry Ports in Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Hello Bernard,

I have been looking up this information from various websites, including yours, and I have come to the conclusion that we have to use Sava Customs clearance. Is that correct? If not, can you please give me an alternative? I have two cargoes from my warehouse in Korea (Dong Ha Port) which I would like to send to Cambodia.

Thanks.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Dry Ports in Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Hi Bernard,

Can you please give me an estimate on the costs for your services? I also have some questions on it:
1. Does the information that I gave you already include your services? If not, how much will it cost?
2. Are the import duties excluded?

Thank you.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Dry Ports in Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Dear Bernard,

Thanks for all your information on the services you can provide for us. Can you also tell me the time of loading the container in China?

Thanks.
