email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Wheat Export
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Taylor, I’m working on an export of bulk wheat from Mina Al Ahmar to Ensenada. Could you provide me with a freight quote, and is that for regular service or LC? Regards, Lea

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Wheat Export
email_chain.body: Hi Lea, Thanks for your email. I have attached our Mexican market page with all our destinations and fees. The quote for 500 tonnes is as follows: $4,500.00 plus V.A.T. Regards, Lea

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Wheat Export
email_chain.body: Hi Lea, Thank you so much for your quote. Would that be less for refrigerated service? I would need to ship within the next couple of days but refrigerated service could be up to 20 days later. Regards, Lea

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Wheat Export
email_chain.body: Hi Lea, Thank you for your message. For that port we can offer a refrigerated service and with the reefer speed in 12 days, the FCL with this speed will be in less than 20 days. Regards, Lea

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Wheat Export
email_chain.body: Thank you. Could I have the FOB price for 4000 tons of wheat also? Can we make a prepaid payment or do you charge an initial payment? What kind of rates do you have for this service? I would also like to know the inland charge of $1.50 from port to consumer. Are there any restrictions on grade, or certificates required? Regards, Lea

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Wheat Export
email_chain.body: Hi Lea, Please, could you send me an email with the grade that you will need for the purchase, also if you want, I can attach you a sample of the certificate to send to the consumer. Regards, Lea

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Wheat Export
email_chain.body: We will be needing the following grade: 1027--410, 2554--320, 3044--330. Any additional certificates needed? Will the wheat need to be in barge? We will also need to know the origin of the wheat. Regards, Lea

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Wheat Export
email_chain.body: Hi Lea, We will be needing the following grade: 1027--410, 2554--320, 3044--330. Any additional certificates needed? Will the wheat need to be in barge? We will also need to know the origin of the wheat. Regards, Lea

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Check Files for Printing
email_chain.body:
Hey Aaron,

It's Chris here from the back office team. We received an important message from one of the senior managers. She asks if you could please pass by your manager's office during your lunch break and check if all files are ready to print.

Please let me know once you've completed this task.

Thanks,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Check Files for Printing
email_chain.body:
Hey Aaron,

We just received an email that some files we need are missing in your folder. They were scheduled to be printed today but aren't ready yet. The manager wants this done as soon as possible.

Thanks,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Check Files for Printing
email_chain.body:
Hey Chris,

My manager hasn't told me to print any files for the day. I'll check when I get back to my office.

Thanks,
Aaron

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Check Files for Printing
email_chain.body:
Hey Aaron,

The manager asked if you've finished printing the files. If you can't print them today, please make sure to label them ready to be printed for tomorrow.

Thanks,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Check Files for Printing
email_chain.body:
Hey Aaron,

I'm the new guy at the office. It seems you forgot to tell me your office number.

Thanks,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Enquiry for Chemical Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sven,

We’re interested in shipping 10,000MT of chemicals from Hamburg to Gdansk. Could you send your rate ideas, and let us know if your vessel is flexible on partial loading windows?

Sincerely,
Louis

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry for Chemical Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sven,

Great to hear from you.

Our colleagues have reviewed your email, and we've arrived at the following response:

"Sorry, but we are unable to load your chemicals from Hamburg to Gdansk. Please also inform us when the vessels are available for loading, and if you have any special requirements. Our reference to a standard rate was purely for information."

Thank you.
Louis

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry for Chemical Shipment
email_chain.body:
Sven,

That is totally unacceptable! You have failed to respond to our enquiry, and have refused to discuss our specific needs with your office. We have therefore decided to engage an alternative freight forwarder for our chemicals.

Best wishes,
Louis

email_chain.subject: Contract Review
email_chain.body:
Hi Sven,

Our company has reviewed our contractual agreements with your company, and we are very disappointed to hear that this can be your standard response.

Best regards,
[Sender's Name]

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Mica Ore Shipment
email_chain.body: We have just finished the technical reevaluation. As you know, we have some difficulties due to the current weather conditions and the damages caused by Hurricane Irene. The situation in New York and elsewhere is very serious. We are not ready to perform a test of samples as yet.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Mica Ore Shipment
email_chain.body: Thanks for your reply. I have re-read our contract carefully. Do you still need me to sign it? I am ready to ship your cargo as soon as I get your signed contract and other documents, like bills of lading, air waybill, etc. Please let me know as soon as possible. Thanks.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Mica Ore Shipment

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Mica Ore Shipment
email_chain.body: We still need to know when your price will be available, and if your price could be higher than quoted by your competitor and if there would be other documents required in addition to the price. I am expecting your reply by tomorrow.

email_chain.subject: Re: Sulphuric Acid Shipping Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Karina,

Thank you for the sulphuric acid enquiry. Based on our past experiences, vessels from Antwerp typically take 10-12 days to reach Houston. Most vessels heading to India use sulphuric acid as ballast cargo, which results in lower revenue for the vessel and consequently higher freight costs. I recommend using a break-bulk vessel to optimize freight costs, especially considering the current international economic uncertainty. Please provide your shipper requirements and let me know if you need a quotation.

Kind regards,
Jon

email_chain.subject: Re: Sulphuric Acid Shipping Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Jon,

Thank you for your response. The distance from India to Houston is 8,325 nautical miles. Could you please provide a detailed quotation for shipping one (1) unit (21.3 cubic meters) of sulphuric acid at 1.32 MW+ acid based on shipper specifications at a FCA Houston port?

Kind regards,
Karina

email_chain.subject: Re: Sulphuric Acid Shipping Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Karina,

Thank you for your follow-up. I have received your updated enquiry and have forwarded it to our contact in India who will provide you with a detailed quotation.

Kind regards,
Jon

David

email_chain.body:
Hello,

I would like to send you an email regarding MS Higgle High. I am thinking of buying the ship but need more information on it. Do you have any available records on the ship? When was it built and when was it last renovated? What kind of fuel is it equipped with? Does it have refrigerated cargo and if so, how much? What else do you know about it?

Please let me know what information you have available. I will be waiting for your reply.

Thank you.

Regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Opportunity for the Sale of Ship High Hope
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

This is to inform you about the opportunity we have for the sale of the ship High Hope. As you can see from the attachment, the ship is in very good condition and does not require any further investments. It is a fully operational and modern vessel. The vessel was purchased previously by the shipyard of 36,000t, 12M2 equipment, with full equipment in conditions for superlatives and submerged at the beginning of the year. It has already completed an inspection by the pilot, cleaned the engine, and is now readied for its new owners.

Please do not hesitate to contact me for more information.

Best regards,
Victor

Attachments: [HighHopeSpecs.pdf]

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Ship Sales
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Quotation Request for Crude Oil Transport
email_chain.body:
Good morning, Robby.

We would like to get a quotation for the transport of 10,000MT of crude oil from Port Louis to Toliara. This is a regular cargo from our company and we are looking forward to getting a reliable and punctual partner on this lane.

Can you give us an early estimate?

Warm regards,
Dan

email_chain.subject: Re: Quotation Request for Crude Oil Transport
email_chain.body:
Hi Dan,

I see you’re looking for quotes for transport of crude oil from Port Louis to Toliara. I have followed up with our sales representative who advised me that they have spoken to you about this cargo. I have just confirmed with him that we do have a crew member in Port Louis and a vessel arriving on 01/02.

I have also been informed that we will have to use our own vessel (cargo vessel) to transport the cargo to Toliara. I have contacted our vessel with this information and they have responded positively to this arrangement and have confirmed their availability to complete the work.

We will be able to provide you with a quotation by the end of today, as I would like to first meet with my boss to make sure this is correct in terms of the operation before sending you our quote.

Regards,
Robby

email_chain.subject: Quotation for Crude Oil Transport
email_chain.body:
Hi Dan,

Thanks for contacting us with your quotation request. I have confirmed with my boss and the quotation you will receive will be as follows:

Route: PL-MRW
Arrival Port: Port Louis
Departure Port: Antsirabe
ETA: 03/02/2009
Crew: 3 sailors
Fare: $4000 per sailor
Voyage: 07 days
VOCSURV(+) in La Reunion
Departure from Port Louis on 03/02/2009
Transport costs (0.5 % per day x 10,000MT):  $500
Total cost: $6500

We will send you the bill in PDF format via email.

Kind regards,
Robby

email_chain.subject: Urgent Shipping Request
email_chain.body:
Ms. Smith,

Ship 3764 leaves Hamburg on May 9 and arrives in New Orleans on May 15. Would you be able to arrange this for 12,500MT of paper rolls from Hamburg to New Orleans? We need to get these on a vessel as soon as possible.

Regards,
Kurt

email_chain.subject: Forwarding Emails
email_chain.body:
Ms. Smith,

Thank you so much for the emails! I really appreciate the help. My friend in Sweden wants a scan of these emails. Would you be able to email these to me at paul.johnson@example.com? And I can send this information to the department of my friend.

Thanks again!
Paul

email_chain.subject: Alternative Supplier
email_chain.body:
Ms. Smith,

Thank you for getting back to me. We're still working on this. I have another idea to contact another supplier. I have checked their line to Hamburg and I'm sure we can work something out.

Thanks again!
Paul

email_chain.subject: Urgent Information from Paul
email_chain.body:
Ms. Smith,

Paul got in touch with me today. He is here with the Department of Marketing at the University of Hamburg and he is actually very busy with getting these shipments from our supplier to New Orleans. Would you mind sending these to him at paul.johnson@example.com? They are important to the project that Paul is doing.

Thanks!
Kurt

email_chain.subject: Urgent Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Smith,

I am very sorry for the late reply but I was traveling in Hamburg this week. I have some urgent news. The company has offered to give the 12,500 MT of paper rolls to us from Hamburg for free, which is great! All the arrangements are in place with our supplier. All the suppliers of shipments for our project have been fixed. I have also spoken to a colleague in New Orleans about the project. I can send you some more information.

Thanks!
Paul

email_chain.subject: Update on Paper Rolls
email_chain.body:
I really appreciate your help. There were 12,500 MT of paper rolls to be arranged but it seems like they are no longer needed. Thank you anyway!

Paul

email_chain.subject: Fix for Paper Rolls
email_chain.body:
I am glad we found the fix for the 12,500 MT of paper rolls. I will send the email about it. Could you please send it to my colleague for 12,500 MT of paper rolls? If you do, please send it to colleague@example.com.

Thanks!
Paul

email_chain.subject: Supplier Agreement
email_chain.body:
We have got the fixed price for the paper rolls! We have already got the supplier in Hamburg for the project. He has agreed to give us the 12,500 MT of paper rolls for 2,500 euros. This is a great deal!

Paul

email_chain.subject: Project Update
email_chain.body:
I have emailed my colleague about the project. She has replied that she will handle it from here.

Paul
